name: Loopsy
description: A quirky loop making game for Playdate.

name: Bread & Fred
description: Grab your best bud for help in this new co-op challenge to help two adorable penguins, Bread and Fred, reach the top of the snowy summit. Time your jumps, cling to walls and swing across gaps to see how far you can make it before you tumble all the way back down the mountain.

name: Glitch Busters: Stuck on You
description: It’s a normal day on the net, until a virus outbreak turns everything upside-down. Only your squad of Glitch Busters can take on the net’s kookiest bugs in an online world gone haywire in this 1-4 player co-op 3rd person shooter.

name: Trials of Kokoro
description: In this turn-based RPG, you will customize a group of heroes' equipment, skills, and strengths, before leading them into exciting battles. Strategic, turn-based combat, detailed party management, and an emotional story come together in this grand, epic adventure across the continent of Vitaria.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun
description: Load up your Boltgun and unleash the awesome Space Marine arsenal to blast your way through an explosion of sprites, pixels and blood in a perfect blend of Warhammer 40,000, frenetic gameplay and the stylish visuals of 90’s retro shooters.

name: Miasma Chronicles
description: From the creators of Mutant Year Zero: Road to Eden comes a beautifully crafted tactical adventure you won’t forget. Embark on a quest across a post-apocalyptic wasteland torn apart by a savage force known only as the ‘Miasma’.

name: The United Space of America
description: The United SPACE of America is a high action, arcade style, run-n-gun bullet hell, twin stick shooter that allows you to absorb enemy bullets with your Proton Sabre while you blast through countless enemies and unlock new abilities. There's air dashing, giant Proton Shots and more!

name: Outerplane
description:
Challenge your abilities in strategy-based combat!
Turn the tide of the battle with your brilliant move!

name: Mystery Case Files: Incident at Pendle Tower
description: A Dark Past Lies Within…

name: Star Trek: Resurgence
description: Star Trek: Resurgence is an interactive narrative video game that tells an original story in a choice-driven adventure set within the iconic sci-fi universe

name: Aether Gazer
description:
Aether Gazer is an ARPG mobile game developed by Yongshi and published by Yostar.

Use your knowledge of each character’s skillset during battle, use power-ups to build combos and customize your squad to unleash the power of Modifiers to save consciousness and reach the promised future of Idealbild.

name: Planet of Lana
description: A young girl and her loyal friend embark on a rescue mission through a colorful world full of cold machines and unfamiliar creatures. Planet of Lana is a cinematic puzzle adventure framed by an epic sci-fi saga that stretches across centuries and galaxies.

name: Blooming Business: Casino
description: Blooming Business: Casino is a business tycoon sim with a narrative twist. Build and run your own fantasy casino in a bustling world full of animals, drama and danger.

name: Convergence: A League of Legends Story
description: CONV/RGENCE: A League of Legends Story is a single player, action platformer game developed by Double Stallion Games and published by Riot Forge. Players will explore the spectacular world of Zaun as Ekko, a young inventor with an ingenious device to manipulate time. Follow Ekko’s journey, a fan-favorite LoL Champion, as he discovers that the power to change time comes with many consequences.

name: Motu Patlu Kung Fu Kings
description: Sin descripción

name: Bring Your Own Class
description:
BYOC (Bring Your Own Class) is a modification for Doom 2 that aims to collaborate creators from a private community to have them Bring Yheir Own Classes in ZDoom derivative sourceports like: Zandronum. While it's made for online, Co-op play, this can be played offline as well.

In the mod there will be both well known characters that you know and love (e.g. Doomguy from Doom, Dr. Doomguy from Dr. Doom, Peppino from Pizza Tower, Heavy from TF2, Serious Sam from Serious Sam, Sir Dan from Medievil, Quote from Cave Story and PTG from PTG) and some original author created characters!

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Truth and Consequences
description:
Set just a few weeks after Spirit of Justice, Phoenix Wright and his friends take on five brand new cases!
Meanwhile, a notorious serial killer has come out of hiding to target Miles Edgeworth.
Can Phoenix figure out who this killer is before they come after Edgeworth himself?
And does the fact that a prosecutor from his past has returned have anything to do with this current dilemma?

name: Victoria 3: American Buildings Pack
description: In many ways, the 19th century was the American Century - continental expansion, rapid population growth, and the stirring of an overseas empire. This pack includes unique building models for the United States, special American designs for other structures and the American Capitol Building as a landmark.

name: Infected Cowboys Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Austrian Avian Association
description: Austrian Avian Association is an episode-length total conversion for Doom II. You play as Katarina Berger, a Schnabelperchten doctor who has to save her home (and, potentially, the world) from a sudden invasion of monsters caused by humans tampering with dark powers.

name: Round People
description: "Round People" is a local multiplayer game where up to four players can battle it out on a trap-filled pool table. Strategy and action are key in this game.

name: Degroid
description:
The game tells the story of a little man named Degroid, who was caught by Mad Doctor. He had gone crazy during his experiments with teleportation.

A player will have to pass the obstacle course to get to the perpetrator of his imprisonment and get out of this endless madness. On the way there will be loads of circular saws, thorns, aggressive slugs, lasers and other lethal obstacles.

Because of teleports, carrying the Degroid`s body between levels, a player acquires immortality, resurrecting after every defeat.

Will he become mad too after countless deaths?

name: Animal Kostume
description: No talk, compadre. It's Animal Kostume time! Follow kroc-boy in his path to overcome a series of difficult levels in this hardcore 2D platformer with a lot of enemies, bullets and surprises.

name: Cruel Reality: A Horrible Dream
description: Horrible Dream - first of the Cruel Reality trilogy, a visual novel with elements of psychological horror.

name: Ketamina
description: "Ketamine" is a First-Person game in which you need to uncover why you woke up without any memory in an apparently unremarkable apartment, until you discover the secrets of the resident and consider whether you really want to stay or leave.

name: Situation Tarfu
description: Situation Tarfu is a simple get to the top arcade game with multiple playable characters each with their own stats!

name: Dying Light: Definitive Edition & Call of Juarez: Gunslinger
description:
The ultimate Zombie and Wild West experiences are now in one bundle!
Includes Dying Light: Definitive Edition + Call of Juarez: Gunslinger!

name: Butterflies
description: Butterflies is a video game about inline skating and graffiti. Apparently some people did that before, but they don't seem like they'll be doing it anymore.

name: Multiplayer Turtles
description: Multiplayer Turtles - Evil Frogs are attacking the Turtle Temple. You and Your elite team must Hack & Slash Your way to get rid of the invaders.

name: Future Racer 2000
description: Only You Can Be The Future Racer 2000

name: Butterflies Episode 3: Welcome to the Jungle
description:
This was once a regular Japanese city. There was stuff, there were places, and things were mostly peaceful.

Butterflies is a video game about inline skating and graffiti. Apparently some people did that before, but they don't seem like they'll be doing it anymore.

This is Episode 3, featuring a visual overhaul, a continuation of the story, new playable characters, new enemies and a new map.

name: Enemies Defender
description: Attention, attention! Enemies are approaching.

name: Trans Neuronica
description: Link nodes; Untangle paths; Rebuild memory; Assess humans; A puzzle where logic goes hand in hand with surgical precision and humans ask artificial intelligence for help. But only if you trust them enough.

name: Victoria 3: Voice of the People
description: Relive the dramatic political events of the 19th century! Drawing from the historical struggles between reformists, reactionaries and revolutionaries, Voice of the People puts you in the middle of political crises as charismatic characters from history vigorously push their agendas.

name: Caveman Ransom
description: A fun 16-bit style platformer where you play a caveman fighting against bandits and dinosaurs. It is perfect for carefree gaming and a must for kids as well as for those who want to experience that 1990s nostalgia!

name: Regenesis
description: Guide a group of survivors trying to strive in this alien yet familiar environment. Fight against mutated creatures and use their parts to craft and upgrade your weapons.

name: Paranormal Hunter
description: Paranormal Hunter is a first-person co-op online multiplayer horror game with VR support. Explore ominous haunted locations, turn your fear into courage, and face sinister supernatural challenges.

name: ANXRacers: Drift Space
description:
A 2D top-down spaceship arcade racing game. Do some spaceship drifting!
ANXRacers offers you the ultimate arcade spaceship racing experience where everything is about reaching the perfect racing time.
Optimize your turns, don't lose your speed, make epic space drifts and set World Records!

As a racing pilot, your goal is to get the spaceship from start to finish, in the least amount of time, while passing any checkpoints on the way in correct order.

name: Prime Directive
description: Marty has crash landed on an alien world. He must escape, but can he survive? Guide him through interconnected environments and fight off hordes of alien creatures while you discover what happened to the abandoned human colony.

name: Sons Of The Dream Forest
description: The beautiful and cruel wilderness requires you to learn survival skills, such as building campsites, making tools, hunting, and gathering. You can cut down trees, fish, plant crops, and even collaborate with other players to tackle environmental challenges together

name: Letter to a Landlord
description: A horror exploration game with great artwork and dark themes.

name: Milfvania Ep. 1
description: An animated adult visual novel, set up in a post-soviet environment. Yes, you live with the landlady.

name: No Me: The Future is Ours
description: Sin descripción

name: The Pact
description: A puzzle-platformer. Two enemies have to become friends and help each other in order to survive. Switch between them and resolve the puzzles to reach the end of each level.

name: Goose-A-Gotchi
description:
Why did gramps send me this goose? Why is it so angry? Maybe we can become friends?

*Made for Game Boy Showdown 2023!*

name: Terrapy
description: Terrapy introduces the player to the complexity of caring for houseplants. Each plant requires its own unique accommodations and will react accordingly to the player’s selections. As is such when caring for each other, Terrapy illustrates the costs and benefits of personal choice and free will within a wholesome environment, integrating horticulture to nurture empathy and growth.

name: 1MagLeft
description: Sin descripción

name: Ganku Ganku
description: Search for the perfect fruit while evading your natural predators!

name: 5 minutes
description: 5 minutes is a visual adventure.

name: Humanoid Huntress
description: Humanoid Huntress is a top-down shooter Built in a tropical wasteland With 2.5D and 3D graphics mixed from a bird eye view. You can interact with NPCs through dialogue or shoot them down with special weapons. Explore your surroundings as you shoot your way through androids and monsters.

name: Nine-Tailed Okitsune Tale
description: Fluffy x Kawaii! A Japanese-style action RPG where the character changes into various forms to solve anomalies that occur in the capital!

name: FloCity
description: FloCity is a run-time simulation game driven by AI cargo ships and water interactions. Dig freeform canal networks, reform shorelines, smooth AI traffic flow, develop lands around the busy ports. Experience your masterpieces like a citizen via a yacht, an airship, and a space capsule.

name: Dark Days: Devil Hunt
description: Fight with many demon goblin golems that invaded all over the Middle Ages Use your special powers.

name: HRO: Adventures of a Humanoid Resources Officer
description: HRO: Adventures of a Humanoid Resources Officer is a puzzle-driven visual novel set in a retro sci-fi universe. When the Endeavor stumbles into universe-shaking trouble, can you harness the power of the bureaucracy to rein in your crew’s worst impulses and survive to the next episode?

name: GB Lunar Lander
description:
Introducing "GB Lunar Lander" – the ultimate lunar landing adventure designed exclusively for the iconic Game Boy! Defy gravity, navigate treacherous terrain, and prove your piloting skills in space.

Embark on a nostalgic journey as an intrepid astronaut tasked with safely landing spacecraft on the rugged lunar surface. With retro '1-bit' aesthetics and addictive gameplay, GB Lunar Lander merges classic charm with modern mechanics for an unforgettable lunar odyssey.

Guide your spacecraft through obstacles, counteract lunar gravity, and touch down on designated landing zones. But beware of escalating challenges like asteroids and treacherous caverns!

Inspired by "Lunar Lander 1979" and "Lunar Lander" for the gameboy(it was only released in Japan!)

name: Smol Snek
description:
Can you feed the hungry snek and avoid corruption?

smol snek is a small snake game for the Atari 8bit computers. Your playing style affects the chance for snek to get corrupted by food.

Earn bonus score by picking up food guaranteed to not corrupt snek. Corruption can spawn bad food, grow snek, make the play field shake or melt in with the background.

Avoid corruption long enough to unlock the secret level!

The game has been tested on a PAL Atari 600XL expanded to 64K, and an PAL Atari 130XE. The game should work fine on NTSC machines, and the snek speed is adapted to be the same on both variants to make high score table fair.

name: The Ultimate Doom
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom - Better Sages Mod
description: A mod which changes the appearance and behavior of the Sages companions in the game, making them stronger and faster, removing their cooldown and making their appearance the same as their original Secret Stone holders.

name: Retro Quiz Tower
description:
You find a mysterious tower while wandering through the forest. You go in to investigate and discover that it is the Retro Quiz Tower. Inside are monsters which are not violent and the only thing they are interested in is Retro. They will test you to show if you know more than them and if so you will get their friendship.
You will be able to overcome all the questions and complete the... Retro Tower Quiz Trial!

name: My Friendly Little Island
description: My Friendly Little Island is a cute game about personal growth and making friends. It starts out as a slow, simplistic adventure game. However, with every new skill you unlock, the game’s dynamics change more and more into a fast-paced platformer.

name: What Friends Are For
description: What Friends Are For is a puzzle platformer for the original Game Boy. It was developed in GB Studio for Game Boy Showdown 2023. Switch between friendly and unfriendly modes to use your enemies to solve puzzles and platforming challenges... or are they your friends? The game features 5 unique levels lovingly made in a week by Shin, with an awesome dynamic soundtrack from Beatscribe.

name: Monkeet
description:
Your sole means of movement is yeeting yourself through the air!
Forget about mundane monke stuff like boring walking or the slightly less boring swinging gracefully from tree to tree. No no no, we're talking monke mobility to a whole new level here!

name: Celebrating Lake Xochimilco
description: May 20th 2023’s interactive Google Doodle celebrates Lake Xochimilco, a natural lake near Mexico City that is the last remaining native habitat for axolotls in the world (cousins of the salamander). The lake was once home to the ancient Aztec civilization during the 15th century, and eventually landowners in the colonial period took over occupation of the lake. On this day in 1920, the Mexican government returned Lake Xochimilco back to the locals. Lake Xochimilco now serves as a recreational site, cultural attraction, and home to the rare axolotl species.

name: Elebeater VR
description: A game that makes you feel like an elevator.

name: A Priest Walks Into a Graveyard
description: A Priest Walks Into a Graveyard is a retro-style action roguelite game with elements of horror. Boost your priest abilities and survive as long as you can in a graveyard full of hostile and never-ending creatures.

name: Grave Robber
description: Grave Robber is a challenging and addictive game with pixel-art aesthetics and retro-inspired soundtrack. A true homage to the classic arcade games. But don't be fooled by its charming appearance - this game is a true test of your skill, requiring laser-sharp focus and split-second decision-making.

name: Axecutioners
description: A minimal-input fighting game to determine who is the greatest Axecutioner of them all! Your huge, unwieldy axe ensures that each of your attacks are slow yet powerful, meaning you need to think and strategize before your next attack to claim victory over your opponent!

name: Bright Tracer
description: Bright Tracer is a high-speed running game, dash through a cyberspace world being invaded by a virus. You stylishly advance through the stages stylishly using various actions such as wall-run and wire-hook. Run, jump, dodge enemies and obstacles through the world to get to the virus's boss.

name: Machine Love 2069
description: Machine Love 2069 is a visual novel for adults with clicker elements and mini-gamesAlex has always been a skilled hacker. One day he received an unusual job offer from a girl named Maya. Maya was a hacker herself, but she needed Alex's help to handle a big task.

name: Devil Dumper Doris
description: Conquer a castle of demons!

name: Country Bumpkin Yutaka
description: Help Yutaka, an awkward country bumpkin, explore her village, and befriend the people who live there.

name: Barista Simulator
description: Barista Simulator lets you experience making a wide variety of coffees just like espresso, latte, cappuccino or even your special mix of coffees. While managing your coffee shop, you play as a Barista and make the coffees your customers want. It's up to you to choose how to treat your shoppers.

name: Berserk Mode
description: Berserk Mode is a fast-paced first-person action roguelite in which to beat the monsters, you'll need to become a monster. Featuring over-the-top slaughter, pixel graphics, experience progression system and procedurally generated zones.

name: Rocket Assault
description: Fast-paced Racing/Action game with smooth controls and rockets to blow up anything that comes in your way!

name: Smash Out
description: Arkanoid style game for ZX Spectrum

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 07
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 2 Episode 7: Hider X Seeker! Cody and Peggy, both wracked with guilt over Pizza Boy's return to lameness, embark on a quest for the perfect gift(s) that'll cheer him up.

name: Anime School Chase Sim
description:
"Anime School Chase Sim" is a casual competitive game.
While having the classic asymmetrical confrontation gameplay, real-time chasing and hiding gameplay has been added. Enhanced real-time interactive confrontation. The game mode also continues the dual mode of hider and catcher, allowing players to experience two different kinds of fun.

name: Hauma: A Detective Noir Story - Prologue
description: Hauma is a deduction visual novel set in Munich. Discover a conspiracy amongst the upper echelons of society alongside former detective Judith, while visiting real locations in a comic-inspired look. This is a free prologue of the full game.

name: The Moshpit Tournament
description:
"The Moshpit" is a Horde Mode TPS Single Player game, where you gun down waves of enemy Cyphers that assault you from every side!

Waves ​have a fixed set of points to be won. The faster you complete the wave & squash your opponents, the MORE points you'll WIN!

name: SM64: Beyond the Cursed Mirror
description: SM64: Beyond the Cursed Mirror is a major Super Mario 64 ROM hack created by Rovert, which contains 15 custom-made courses and 120 stars waiting to be collected. With a unique in-depth story, original characters, and new mechanics, this SM64 ROM hack will provide a traditional yet unique experience.

name: LEGO 2K Drive: Year 1 Drive Pass
description: Purchase the Premium versions of each Season to earn even more rewards as you play through each Season or Purchase the Year 1 Drive Pass to get the Premium versions of Seasons 1-4. Season rewards include Vehicles, Drivers, Stickers, Flairs, Sounds, Brick Packs, and more! The Year 1 Drive Pass also includes the Awesome Pizza Vehicle and 550 Coins you can use in Unkie's Emporium.

name: School Romance: Love or Lose
description: Your high school life is about to be anything but average—you just got accepted into one of the most prestigious schools in the country! But there’s a catch… In order to stay enrolled, you need to find a girlfriend before the end of the school year!

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Silver Edition
description:
Game includes:
15+ Stages
30+ Weapons

name: Theft Ride Legacy
description: Gear up for the ultimate treasure hunt on wheels!

name: Urban Flow: Silver Edition
description: Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-crafted, low-poly world to discover the enormous satisfaction of watching the hundreds of tiny, colorful cars flowing through the streets – all while listening to the chill, urban music.

name: Swords & Bones: Complete Edition
description: Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games.

name: Burger Chef Tycoon: Co-op Edition
description:
Tasty burgers? Only in here!
Like going out to town for a snack? Everybody does!

But perhaps you'd like to see that from the other side?
Not everyone can, so don't waste the opportunity!

Manage the preparation of burgers, fries, crispy chicken and a multitude of other treats!

name: Citadale Resurrection: Prelude to War
description: DLC for Citadale Resurrection. Prelude to War is an early 1990s handheld styled action platformer.

name: Elven Rivers 2: New Horizons - Collector's Edition
description: Celene and her brave teammates have already earn a reputation for themselves: this is why they were chosen to be the first group to explore the neighbouring continent of beastmen.

name: The Wonderful 101: Remastered - The Wonderful One: After School Hero - Part 1
description:
Get ready for a unique side-scrolling experience in the world of The Wonderful 101: Remastered! This free DLC lets you enjoy a brand new episode in which you experience Luka's story!

As the latest member of the CENTINELS, new recruit Luka delivers remarkable achievements. What challenges did he need to overcome to become the prestigious Wonder Goggles? This is a story of love, battle, and growth. Experience Luka's journey to becoming a full-fledged hero!

name: Fatum Betula + Food Truck Tycoon
description: Immerse yourself in a world of magic and culinary mastery with the enchanting Fatum Betula + Food Truck Tycoon Bundle on Xbox!

name: Iromaze Ink Shop
description:
Elozen Ink Store, an ink store that packs and ships mysterious ink inks into bottles.
Ink stunt'Ink-chan' has a habit of getting happy when he shows the same color as himself and enters the bottle.
Be careful, multiple ink dolls can appear at the same time, and at this time you have to show all the colors of the ink ink mixed in.
Get the correct colors fast before the ink gets away!

name: The Dark Pursuer
description: You find yourself locked up alone in an abandoned place, but something is nearby, something dark and dangerous. Try to look for ways to get out of there before you can no longer...

name: Dig Deep: Complete Edition
description:
Grab a shovel and let's get digging! Join the adventure, hire miners and dig for a treasure.
Shovel your way to success: go underground and dig for treasure like a mole on a mission. But don't worry, you won't get stuck in a hole - unless you forget to hire workers to boost your digging empire.

name: Loud: RockStar Edition
description: Get ready to rock & roll with this bundle in a heartwarming music arcade rhythm game!

name: Amaze! Complete Bundle
description:
Lets pop & move the ball and paint - you’ve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles.

Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!

Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.

name: Pogglewash
description: A 3D platformer in which you play as a robot on an alien planet cleaning up polluted goop while interacting with cute creatures named Pogglewonks.

name: Cubic Figures 2
description: Make up figures from shaped blocks!

name: Hime's Blossom
description: Spring rain, sakura petals are slowly falling off... You can feel the sweet scent of flowers in the air. Each of the princesses is looking for her own special petal...

name: The Wailer
description: A highly stylized horror adventure game set in the depths of an ancient dungeon. With torch in hand, explore and find a way to escape before falling prey to the unspeakable horror that lurks within.

name: Saint Hell
description: Saint Hell is a 2D RPG in which you will need to choose the side of angels or demons and lead them to victory.

name: Cyber Citizen Shockman
description: Slash and shoot your way through robots rampaging in Shockman's town!

name: Old Coin Pusher Friends 2
description: "Old Coin Pusher Friends 2" is an online cooperative coin pusher game set in the Edo period. Players work together to defeat yokai, repel skulls, and aim for the jackpot. As the game progresses, players can upgrade their abilities and equipment to become stronger.

name: Pillars
description: Pillars is a 3D platformer where the environments are put first and foremost to provide a fun, relaxing experience climbing all six levels.

name: Our Life: Beginnings & Always - Baxter's Story
description: Enjoy exciting summer days in the company of Baxter Ward during Steps 3 and 4! This is an optional DLC for the free game Our Life: Beginnings & Always.

name: Bike Offroad Simulator
description: The Bike Offroad Simulator is a racing-simulation game that puts you to the test again.

name: Castlewatch
description: Castlewatch is a classical Tower Defense Game

name: Bullet Time Battle
description: Bullet Time Battle is a FPS that adds precision to combat against enemy forces with bullet time. Experience an explosive gameplay as you plant/defuse bomb or capture/defend flags while battling enemies. Are you ready?

name: Bad Times at the Silver Lake
description: Immerse yourself in the story of Sarah and her dog Shibu. Solve the mystery of the terrible virus infection and save the city of Salt Lake. Solve puzzles, shoot zombies and learn the terrible secrets of this city.

name: PlasmaBlast 1.0.0 Beta
description: This game is still in development but is still playable, so I have released it early! When playing the game with your friends one person choses to be the mech (The boss) and everyone else can chose one of their favorite characters to try and beat the boss.

name: Kuroinu Redux
description: Desperate to end a bloody war, the Seven Shields Alliance—led by an elven goddess incarnate—seek out the assistance of the protagonist Vult and his Black Dog Mercenaries. He turns on them them and takes control in this visual novel story of betrayal.

name: Rome: The Mystery of the Chronovisor
description: Solve the mystery of the enigmatic time machine! In this Hidden Object Adventure game you will go for a walk around Rome to search for the secret of the Chronovisor and save the heroes who have fallen into a trap. You will make unbelievable discoveries on your way!

name: Feet Sweeper
description: Minesweeper?? Nope, Feet Sweeper! Feet, Feet and Feet everywhere you look.

name: Hexapoda
description: After the last human war, gases were spread through the atmosphere making it unbreathable, pushing the richest to flee to orbital colonies and the others to take refuge underground. Get ready to fight giant Insects for the future of humanity !

name: Dead City
description: It doesn't matter who you are or who you were before. Welcome to the Dead City!

name: No Crime
description: The story takes place in South East Asia. Start from a drug case, follow private detective Sui Feng to discover a mysterious complexion full of conspiracy, overcome his intermittent amnesia, and avenge for his love…Can you find out the real culprit through fragments of memories?

name: Lobby Loitering
description: Have you ever felt like, in a single step, the world around you changed, and you didn't notice until it was too late? Explore a collection of alternate realities in an attempt to get Marcel back to the reality he belongs in.

name: Vampire Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: LEGO 2K Drive
description:
Welcome to Bricklandia, home of a massive open-world LEGO driving adventure. Race anywhere, play with anyone, build your dream rides, and defeat a cast of wild racing rivals for the coveted Sky Trophy!

In LEGO 2K Drive, your awesome transforming vehicle gives you the freedom to speed seamlessly across riveting racetracks, off-road terrain, and open waters. Explore the vast world of Bricklandia, show off your driving skills, and build vehicles brick-by-brick!

name: Avian Knights
description: Battle it out with your friends or compete for the title of Grand World Champion in Avian Knights, the crazy game of mounted mayhem combat! Featuring an 8-player competitive arena mode, a classic arcade co-op mode, and tons of weapons and power-ups, there’s plenty of ways to play!

name: Lusty God
description: Lusty God is a puzzle game where you are a God that decided to create a whole world out of boredom. Explore lots of elements and make lots of interesting things to satisfy your lust! Let's start creating!

name: First Odium
description: A prequel to Trash Vomit Studios first videogame "Victim". First Odium is a basic turn based RPG that explores the strange world of the Ominous Oppression from a differentiated minimalist perspective.

name: Café 0: The Sleeping Beast - Remastered
description: The supernatural mystery visual novel, "CAFE 0 ~The Sleeping Beast~" returns as a remastered version. Will the maid, Corliss, find out why she died within the seven days time limit? New features include a graphics overhaul, day selection option, and improved UI and readability

name: Aimtropolis
description: Do you think you have a good aim? Prove it. Aimtropolis is a VR arcade/shooter where you will have to prove yourself and the rest of the world in 12 random mini-games from the 50 available. Get the highest score, and position yourself as a world champion.

name: Vividlope
description: Vividlope, the head-spinning, mind-bending arcade game with a puzzle touch! Master the imaginative realm, where the gravity doesn't quite work as you're used to, overcome your foes and keep on painting!

name: Dagdrøm
description: Dagdrøm is a classic point-and-click adventure, where you travel across desert dunes towards The Great Tower to find questions, answers and most importantly: something to drink.

name: Monstrous Love
description: Monstrous Love contains three adult short stories, focusing on women discovering their sexuality and freedom with gentle yet ferocious monsters. Be seduced by a world of love, sex, and claws in this sex-positive gaming experience!

name: Under Contract
description: An erotic high-skill match 3 arcade game with a comedy-driven narrative that’s guaranteed to lighten a load or two. Climb the corporate ladder and take control!

name: Surprise Cat
description: Surprise Cat is a hidden object game with puzzles. Unleash your inner feline with original gravity-defying gameplay and mind-bending puzzles. Search for hidden objects and use them to defeat your enemies!

name: Toumayhem
description: Toumayhem is a sci-fi/mystery visual novel set in Shigo Private High School, in Hokkaido; Yuki, a timid first-year, gets roped into a fight to overthrow the school's social system, and mixed up in a series of murders.

name: Dead Ink
description: Dead Ink is a souls-like game with a 3D printing twist, set at dizzying height atop a perilous vertical world. Discover printers and use harvested ink from your enemies to print weapons, inventory items and your corporeal form.

name: Against All Odds
description: Water's cut. Rent's due. Jobs are scarce. Time to get rich. Enter the Slaughter League and win against all the odds in a dizzying array of lethal multiplayer races. In this competitive, multiplayer platformer party game, there can only be one winner, so kiss those friendships goodbye!

name: Dead Monarchy
description: Dead Monarchy is a turn-based, tactical RPG with roguelike elements, inspired by games such as Battle Brothers, XCOM and Jagged Alliance. Equip your warriors with historically inspired equipment and attempt to survive in a dying world overrun by all manner of monsters.

name: Graduated
description: You are a freshly graduated college student, and countless choices are unfolding before your eyes, how do you go forward, and finally live the life you want to live.

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Flaming Sunrise Campaign by Sandman Simulations
description: It is June 2005. Situation at Persian Gulf has been stable for some years. For the last month there has been rising tension from new direction while Iran has launched multiple naval and air force exercises at southern coast of the country. Iran has made political and diplomatic provocations against other Gulf States, mostly United Arab Emirates, accusing them about production of nuclear and chemical weapons and repeated attacks against Iran commercial shipping. Maybe most worrying was statement of Iran defense minister speaking in Iran television last week telling United Arab Emirates being governed by national socialist leaders threatening security of Iran citizens living in Emirates.

name: Bear No Grudge
description:
Take control of Bear and shoot, skate, race your way to justice across multiple locations in this action adventure game with a bite.

Bear no grudge is a grizzly action adventure game with bite.

In Bear No Grudge, players take control of a vengeful bear on a mission to take down the careless international delivery corporation, Forest Inc, that left his friend in a wheelchair. and destroying the planet This action-packed game features multiple locations, each with its own unique gameplay mechanics and challenges. Players will have to use their wits and quick reflexes to defeat enemies and bosses, while also navigating challenging environments on skateboards, hovercrafts and paws. As they progress, players can find hidden collectables to upgrade abilities to help them on their mission. With its diverse gameplay, Bear No Grudge offers a thrilling and satisfying gaming experience for anyone who enjoys fun. Set across 11 different levels you will pursue the evil CEO, Taking down hench men and a variety of baddies and leaving destruction in your path.

name: AI Doctor
description:
Destroy all the viruses that make patients sick!
Play easily and simply with one hand anytime, anywhere!
Brilliant attack effects of various roguelike skill combinations are basic!
A cool action and a sense of impact that will blow away all the stress you don't have!
Upgrade Baruda to become the world's strongest physician by equipping and combining various equipment!

name: Sapphire City Part 2
description: After a narrow escape you find yourself in an unexplored part of the city with fresh opportunities and new enemies. Face off against corrupt officials, law enforcers and merciless gangs as you delve back into the shadows.

name: Gentei Shooter
description: Gentei Shooter is a fast paced bullet hell game where defeating a certain enemy can drop weapons. The weapons you can get from a triangle are better than the default shot, but they have limited ammo.

name: NieR Re[in]carnation: The People and the World
description: The People and the World is the third story arc of NieR Re[in]carnation, revolving around previously encountered memory characters within The Cage.

name: Fortnite: Coldest Circle Quest Pack
description:
When fiends freeze over you get the Coldest Circles Quest Pack. Complete Quests to unlock:
- Underworld Desdemona Outfit
- Frozen Oculara Back Bling
- Cold Furia Pickaxe
- Frozen Over Wrap

name: Wand of Fortune R for Nintendo Switch: Limited Edition
description:
Limited Edition of the Nintendo Switch port of Wand of Fortune R. This edition comes with an exclusive bonus booklet and six character cards.

Lulu is a student of a magic school, but is actually a trouble student. Because of her poor magic skills and continual troubles, she was forced to transfer to a different school. She happily joined the new school, but soon discovered a shocking fact... She doesn't have an attribute as a magical girl! If she can't find her attribute before she graduates, her magic power will need to be sealed... Well, will she be able to find it...?

name: Wand of Fortune R for Nintendo Switch
description:
Port of Wand of Fortune R for Nintendo Switch.

Lulu is a student of a magic school, but is actually a trouble student. Because of her poor magic skills and continual troubles, she was forced to transfer to a different school. She happily joined the new school, but soon discovered a shocking fact... She doesn't have an attribute as a magical girl! If she can't find her attribute before she graduates, her magic power will need to be sealed... Well, will she be able to find it...?

name: G-Mode Archives+: Todo Ryuunosuke Tantei Nikki vol.1 - Kohakuiro no Igon: Seiyou Karuta Renzoku Satsujin Jiken
description: Sin descripción

name: Blackpink: The Game
description:
A whole new journey with Blackpink! Become Blackpink's producer and manage your own agency, solve puzzles to clear schedules for Blackpink.
Customize your members with stunning outfits and play mini-games with your friends in the Blackpink world.

name: Sudoku: Casual Board Game
description:
Sudoku is a very old puzzle for training the mind, logic and attentiveness!
Sudoku is the oldest and very popular mindfulness puzzle! There are riddles for every taste - from the simplest to the most complex. And if the task is beyond your power, then you can always use the hints that will help in solving the puzzle.

Pleasant music and colorful graphics will allow you to immerse yourself in the game, completely relax and have a good rest. Forget about paper sudoku, now the puzzle will always be with you on your device! Train your brain, develop logic and mindfulness!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Numberlink
description:
Intuitive puzzle where you draw lines
to connect the same numbers.

name: UnderDungeon: Deluxe Edition
description: Bundle contains the game + a soundtrack!

name: Party Party Time: Character Skin Pack
description: Customize your character! Change up your look with over 20 different skins! Be it a ninja, clown, or astronaut, dress up in style and get ready to party!

name: Arcade Paradise: High Score Edition
description:
The Arcade Paradise High Score Edition includes
- Arcade Paradise (full game)
- All 8 Arcade Paradise DLC packs

name: Arcade Paradise: Vostok Inc. Pinball
description: Do you like money? How about Arcades? Then you'll LOVE Vostok Inc. Pinball!!

name: Golf With Your Friends: Corrupted Forest Course
description: An unusual meteor strike has seeped corruption into our beloved Forest. Journey through the challenging 9-hole course and delve into the dark side of the woods. Can you complete the course under-par and earn the exclusive crown?

name: August Walk
description: The game has three story branches: normal, realistic, and mystical walk. In the normal branch you can just walk around the summer city, the forest and the spring.

name: Text Twist Classic
description: Get ready for some word-finding fun game in Text Twist Classic! Around 1800 different words to learn! Look at the jumbled letters and find all the word combinations. Over 8000 levels. Two different modes to play: Untimed and Timed.

name: J-Town: A Visual Novel
description: A friendly crash course in Japanese American history, culture, and community! Inspired by the real stories of the three historic Japantowns of California: San Francisco, San Jose, and Los Angeles's Little Tokyo.

name: Spooples
description: Survive flying through the depths of the Underworld as Spooples the Ghost! Jump through gaps found inside walls of flesh to increase your score. Use bullets to kill Demon Dogs!

name: Find the Pairs: Classic Memory Puzzle
description: The classic memory training puzzle for the whole family - find a matching pairs!

name: BlackJack Waifu Tour
description: Feel like in Las Vegas, gamble without spending money at our real blackjack!

name: Apploval
description: New sensation! Real-time roguelike! Automatically generated random dungeon! The level is reset every time, so you can enjoy it again.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The House
description: The owner of a house gave a warm welcome to me who got lost. I fell asleep and woke up.

name: Zenful Journey
description: Step into a world of serenity and tranquility with Zenful Journey, the ultimate walking simulator for those seeking a moment of calm in their day. This zen-themed game invites you to explore a beautiful forest at your own pace, ticking off items on your list as you go.

name: Multiplayer Military
description: Multiplayer Military - Aliens are invading the Military Base. The World needs Your Help. You and Your team of Elite Soldiers must take out all Aliens and Save the Planet.

name: MalViolence: Definitive Edition
description: Caution: Escape from this supervillain at your own risk...A sci-fi visual novel packed with brain-teasing puzzles.

name: The Blood Mage by Daniel da Silva
description: The Blood Mage is a fast-paced Puzzle/RPG hybrid. Reach the powerful blood crystal!

name: Rule the Waves 3
description:
Build Your Navy, from pre-Dreadnoughts to Aircraft Carriers and Missile Cruisers!
Rule the Waves 3 is a simulation of naval ship design and construction, fleet management and naval warfare from 1890 to 1970 and will place you in the role of 'Grand Admiral' of a navy from the time when steam and iron dominated warship design up to the missile age. Rule the Waves 3 will let you design and build the ships of your navy, and lead them into battle when war erupts.

You will guide your navy's deployment, construction and operations during a period of great technological innovation and political tensions. While the game derives much of its technology and events from 'actual' history, you will find that you forge your own new history each and every time you play!

name: A Special Place In Hell
description: Scavenge for weapons, ambush your friends, die trying. A Special Place In Hell is an 8-man fast-paced top-down battle royale-lite inspired by 4-bit games of the Atari 2600 era.

name: The Red
description: Debt-ridden and desperate? Get out of the red and into The Red! Join the Red Horizons on Mars as an Extraction Security Associate and pay off your debts by defending your way to wealth in this ironic first-person/tower-defense/comedy-horror adventure!

name: Magic Bubble Shooter: Classic Bubbles Arcade
description: A classic puzzle game in which you have to clear the game field by shooting coloured bubbles, candies and lollipops!

name: SpearHeads
description: Spear your friends in this 4-player 2D spear-throwing arena deathmatch! Players will compete by collecting various spears and taking aim to throw them at your enemies until only one player or team-colour is left standing.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Dogs
description: Poly Jigsaw: Dogs is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a doggy.

name: Loop Hero: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The physical Nintendo Switch game
- An exclusive 104-page “Loop Hero Bestiary” Artbook
- The game´s Official Soundtrack download voucher
- A Collectible tuck-in box housing all the contents.

name: Mountaincore
description: Settle an untamed wilderness with the might of Dwarven engineering and thoughtful planning! Design and build your colony towards fame and fortune in a deeply-simulated fantasy world. Chill out in peaceful mode with a bustling settlement, or fight for survival against monsters and invasions!

name: Is This Weapon?
description: Dodge! fighting! upgrade! Every time you level up, you can gain abilities, use various combinations, and survive in the endless stream of monsters!

name: Hero's Land
description: Hero’s Land is an open-world, multi-player survival game. In here, you can unlock distinctive heroes as you progress your exploration, or you can train on-map pets to be your combat partners. Don’t forget that you can make friends, put together a team, and build a home of your own team. Stay alive!

name: StackHoops
description: A casual multiplayer basketball-like game. Play against your friends, random matchmaking, or against the computer. Customize your ball, court, and more to showoff to the world and win in style. Complete challenges and prove your skills!

name: Jump Puzzle
description: A platform jump decryption game. Jump between plots with different functions to help the unicorn reach its destination.

name: Stack Masters
description: Stack irregular shaped blocks to create towers and reach the 'Goal Zone'. Unlock new levels, compete on the leaderboards, create your own levels and share them via the Steam Workshop.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Flowers
description: Escape to stunning floral landscapes

name: Deliverance & Reign
description: Join a gothic battle where Good confronts Evil using roguelike deckbuilding mechanics. Play as either side, invading Alaric's Castle, or as Alaric himself defending against the invading heroes!

name: Grey Haven
description: Grey Haven is a game where you explore Nightmare and build a village with the girls you saved. Explore the Nightmare with the help of the witch, help the girls and gather resources to build your haven.

name: Endless Dungeon: Day One Edition
description: Endless Dungeon is a unique blend of roguelite, tactical action, and tower defense set in the award-winning Endless Universe. Plunge into an abandoned space station alone or with friends in co-op, recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, and protect your crystal against never-ending waves of monsters... or die trying, get reloaded, and try again.

name: Murtop
description: Murtop is fast-paced arcade game packed with action, as if it was taken out directly from the 80's. Do you have enough coins to beat it?

name: Daily Life With My Succubus Boss
description: With the lewd succubus, start a cohabitation life without shame and impatience. Master artist Tamada Heijun, super crazy full Live 2D!

name: Aerial Platforms
description: Aerial Platforms is a first person platformer game. Run your way through levels, before the timer hits 0:00, jumping on different platforms while ("the floor is lava")

name: Night Gate
description: Night Gate is the result of crossing an open-world Castlevania with the action of Resident Evil. You play as a Vampire Hunter on a quest to kill the Master Vampire, Grendel! Set in the swamps of the American South, take your Airboat to explore in a 20+ hour open-world RPG horror game.

name: Pocket Mirror: GoldenerTraum
description:
Delve into the enthralling world of Pocket Mirror ~ GoldenerTraum, the acclaimed RPG Maker gothic horror game that'll take you on a moving journey of self-discovery.

This remaster includes new visuals, additional features, a brand new ending, 2D animated sequences, and a bonus room along with new game plus features.

name: Veiled Experts
description: Free-to-Play 5v5 tactical shooter where agent's unique Lepton skills meet action- packed gun mechanics. Available on Steam!

name: Zigglox
description: Team up with friends or get online and find bricks to build the highest and prettiest tower before the other team ! Beware though, some bricks are... specials!

name: Forza Polpo
description: It is the year 199X, and the world has been destroyed like it's an anime. Use your brave tiny Octopus robot to traverse a Japan frozen in time and place to defeat the evil Dr. Prometheus in this 90's-inspired and 2020-made action game full of neon, lasers, and tiny robots.

name: Firmament
description:
"From Cyan, the indie studio that brought you Myst and Obduction, comes a new steampunk adventure.

The game of Firmament is a resplendent, magical, journey — a monumental voyage through four diverse and curious realms, working in concert with an ever-present, clockwork companion, and the support and instruction of a long-dead, ethereal mentor.

Everything is not as it seems."

name: Happy Place
description: Sin descripción

name: Foliage vs. Undead
description: A game created with the proposal of being a 3D version of Plants vs. Zombies.

name: First Comes Love
description: First Comes Love is the first and only book of the First Comes Love series.

name: Isonzo: Expedition Units
description: The ‘Expedition Units' pack expands the German faction with a set of winter themed uniforms and accessories, plus a set of battle hardened elite troops. It contains two sets of uniforms for all classes, plus a wealth of headgear options.

name: Hyper Apocalypse
description: Are you ready to face the ultimate challenge in a world overrun by zombies? Defeat zombies, kill the bosses, develop your community, upgrade your buildings, help people and have fun. Never before has a zombie apocalypse been this much fun!

name: V Rising: Sinister Evolution Pack
description: Embrace the new world of technology and become the dark alchemist you were meant to be. Light your breathtaking halls with the glow of bio-luminous bubbling lanterns. Fill your halls with beautiful bronze, cured wood, and gleaming glass lined with the remnants of experimental monstrosities.

name: Shuffleboard Dungeon
description: Roll your way through over thirty encounters with careful aim and thoughtful strategy. Learn the strengths and weaknesses of different enemies as you battle your way through a Gothic citadel.

name: Ultraviolet
description:
There is a brilliant incandescence within you.

Fight your way through monsters, solve puzzles, and discover what Ultraviolet means to you. A puzzle platformer with satisfying combat.

name: WWE 2K23: Pretty Sweet Pack
description:
Step into the ring with the Pretty Sweet Pack, including Luke Gallows and Karl Anderson, Pretty Deadly (Elton Prince and Kit Wilson), and Tiffany Stratton.

Each playable Superstar also comes with their own MyFaction card.

The Pretty Sweet Pack is already included with the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.

name: Screwball Scramble
description: A fun browser game where you guide a marble through a tricky course without falling off the track. Your goal is to beat the clock and get the best possible score.

name: Popeye Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves
description: Sin descripción

name: 1001 Jigsaw Detective 3
description: An exciting and suspenseful adventure in the world of detectives. Assemble the puzzles and enjoy the colorful and exciting pictures.

name: Glaive 3
description: 10 short, action focused maps for Doom 2, inspired by Scythe. The wad is divided into 2 visual themes. The first 5 maps are techbases, the next 5 are a visual mashup of Shores of Hell, Plutonia and Scythe 2's jungle episode. The gameplay is classic styled mostly without slaughter, but there are some large fights.

name: PonyGuessr
description: Guess the episode each My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic frame is from.

name: MM
description: A narrative game about "a man's request for a life without regrets".

name: Sum
description: I don't know what I've become or if I've always been this way. But I do know that I love you too and that is enough.

name: Vigor Chronicles: Salvation
description: Unfold the Chronicles and repent for salvation! What would you do if the apocalypse forced you to leave your precious city? How would you adapt to a different environment? In this update, you can enjoy Myren as an Encounter map and discover the secrets left behind from the society that abandoned it. Gain your vantage point and eliminate your enemies with the new L96 sniper rifle.

name: Drift Horizon: Car Driving & Tuning
description: Become a legendary drifter! Tune and upgrade your car, install parts and boost performance! With a dozen of cars to choose from, get them on the track and test them out!

name: A Rare Encounter
description: A Rare Encounter is a short visual-novel written by Raina Lilith Henlan, with programming and art by Sophie Le Blanc. This project was made to get something out there, while testing the waters for bigger projects down the line.

name: Titor's Time Traveling Tale
description: Step into the shoes of a medieval physicist studying the theory of time travel in "Titor's Time Traveling Tales," the VR escape room game. While conducting experiments on a strange artifact, you accidentally activate it and find yourself transported to a server room in the distant future.

name: Chicken Tricks
description: Peck, dodge and shoot your way through endless waves of enemies. Upgrade your Chick and prove you have what is needed to avoid being turned into fried chicken.

name: Hawken Reborn
description:
Return to the world of high-octane mech combat in Hawken Reborn. Construct your ultimate war machine and shoot your way through hordes of enemies to uncover the mysteries of Ilall in this brand-new Free-to-Play PVE mech game.

Hawken Reborn is a PvE first person shooter, whilst the original Hawken was an exclusively PvP experience. Pilots may not be going head-to-head in Hawken Reborn against each other, but they can expect just as much combat and high-octane mech fighting as you explore the new world of Illal.

name: V Rising: Secrets of Gloomrot
description:
A FRESH CHAPTER ON YOUR VAMPIRE JOURNEY!
Behold new footage of the coming update, just one week away on May the 17th. For those of you who have missed it, here's a quick catch-up on some of the features you can expect to revamp your blood-sucking experience.

With this update comes multi-level castles, the new territory system, and sweeping improvements to building and decorating your lair! Finally, you have the tools to make a mighty citadel worthy of your power.

Vardoran has been reimagined! From beautiful new vistas that house terrifying and mystifying new threats to the cursed, choking mist that completely warps the Cursed Forest experience, you can discover the human-infested lands as if it's your first time again.

A massive new zone with two unique areas twisted in the pursuit of cruel science. Navigate polluted valleys and lightning-scorched highlands to face the mutated experiments and mechanical wonder spawned from the maddened imaginations of the Trancendum.

name: Knock & Run
description: Grab an orb and prepare to fight - It's about to go down. Compete your friends and knock down everyone!

name: Paint by Pixel 2
description: Create your pixel masterpiece today!

name: Eye of Saccharine
description: A girl suffering from hallucinations tries her best to live a normal life in the megapolis. She sees an advertisement for a certain doctor presenting a revolutionary technology for diagnosing and treating the psyche, "G.L.A.Z.A".

name: Love Love Joe Biden: The Joe Biden Dating Simulator
description: Welcome to the retirement home! To win Joe's heart, you'll have to navigate the enticing world of gilfs, big hunky wolf-men, and sleepy presidents... Do you have what it takes?

name: Roguebot
description: Fast-paced Roguelike shooter in a dystopian steampunk future.

name: Tavern of Empire
description: Tavern of Empire is a story role-playing game. It has a turn-based action system. As a spy from a different country, you are sent to clean up monsters in a town. Thanks to its graphics and music, you can play calmly or ambitious.

name: Deadblast
description: Arrange the warriors correctly to defeat the enemy!

name: Aliens Tower Defense
description: Sometimes it's better to prevent something that might happen...

name: Love on Leave
description: You have some paid time off and decide to use it to return to your roots in the countryside.

name: I am Sakuya VR: Touhou FPS Game
description: Now in VR! Dodge bullets, shoot enemies and even stop time as you navigate through 15 beautiful levels in this perfect blend of bullet hell and VR FPS. Uncover the origins of Sakuya Izayoi's past and investigate the mansion where the scarlet vampires resides in this Touhou Project Fangame!

name: Assassin: The First List
description: Assassin is a stealth action game in which information is power. Become the master assassin, taking on the role of a highly-trained agent who's been sent to eliminate a group of targets from around the world. They will never know what hit them.

name: Love Exalt 8372
description: A furry visual novel about a death game on a train. Read the minds of characters through minigames, choose which perspectives you want to see, and uncover the mysterious lore behind twelve unique characters.

name: Meta Ball
description: Meta Ball, and again you get into the world of a rolling ball. Only this time there are thirty levels, and it’s fun. Easy control and insanely exciting passing obstacles with a rolling ball. Go around and jump over obstacles using only a mouse and a keyboard.

name: MatchR: Now Hiring
description: Fight with your colleagues to ascend through the MatchR company in this Match-3, RPG and Roguelike mix! Choose, upgrade and use your skills to emerge victorious! Gain new character traits during your runs which will drastically change the way you plan your matches! Also... Sticker collection!

name: Nosy Little Fly
description: Nosy Little Fly is a funny 2D side scroller with an unique movement mechanic. Instead of moving sideways as usual, you can add force to your character in any direction. You must manage you inertia in order to finish the levels. It is a challenge to your motor skills, filled with humor.

name: Greedventory
description: Greedventory is a gorgeous pixel-art narrative RPG experience, where the only thing between you and an embarrassingly swift death is your mouse. Strike, parry, and cast powerful spells on your enemies, loot ancient treasures, explore a brutal realm, and become the hero you never wanted to be!

name: Aetheris
description: Go on an adventure to save your village from a voracious Shade. Alone or accompanied, this turn-based roguelite will take you on a journey through a world of incomparable and colourful landscapes.

name: Castle of Alchemists
description: In Castle of Alchemists, a tower defense/top-down action hybrid game with amazing pixel art graphics, play as the Bellator, alchemically enhanced defender, to fight against invaders from other worlds. Delve into the castle, set your traps, equip powerful weapons and gears, and reclaim the castle piece by piece.

name: Elypse
description: Embark upon a tragic tale and discover the ravaged world of Elypse! Fight your destiny in an arduous 2D adventure, story rich platformer, in a mesmerising and mysterious world.

name: Sheriff Exam
description: Sheriff exam is a fully playable western shooting simulator with one main adventure mode and mini-games (preliminaries). Compleat all the missions and become the new Sheriff.

name: Marvel HQ
description:
Marvel HQ is the ultimate destination for kids ages 3-8 to explore the Marvel Universe, offering access to a wide range of comics, videos, activities, and more.

Marvel HQ is a treasure trove of heroic content. This massive app offers a vast array of activities, videos, comics, and creative tools. Whether coding with Hulk, watching thrilling episodes of Spidey and His Amazing Friends, reading Marvel stories, or revealing and encouraging artistic talents. Kids can even take care of, play with, and nurture their very own Groot. There's always something new to discover.

name: Heroes Strategy・Heroes Strategy・Kards
description: "Heroes Strategy・Heroes Strategy・Kards" is a strategy card competitive game with European and American cartoon style. they can like. In troubled times, there are clever tricks in the bag. What is the world, boil wine and talk about heroes!

name: Shmoup
description: Sin descripción

name: Long Hike with a Cute Girl
description: Grace asked you to come with her on a quiet early morning hike, but her tight shorts and upbeat attitude make it seem like maybe she has a little more in store for you...

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Woven from Last Snow
description:
Version 6.6 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Dreamweaver & Terminal Aide 0017
• New Story Chapter XXXVII: Of Salt, Snow, and Sand
• New Featured Event: TeRiRi's Magical Quest
• ...and more!

name: Blade Dancer: Lineage of Light
description: Experience Blade Dancer: Lineage of Light originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Flight Simulator Airplane Game
description: Airplane flight simulator adventure games offer a unique and thrilling gaming experience to fulfill your dreams of becoming a skilled pilot. Plane games pilot simulator 3D has an immersive and realistic Flight Simulator gaming experience. Airplane games provide a realistic plane simulation of flight physics, aircraft models, and environments in flight pilot games. You will experience the ultimate airplane flying fun in this free flight simulator game.

name: Pretzel Rides VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Volcania Peaks
description: Volcania Peaks is a strange area, filled to the brim with lava, smoke and fire. And there's been some unusual events occurring there. In an offer to help put a stop to this sudden madness, you decide to take a step in...

name: Tin Hearts
description: A VR port of Tin Hearts

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Extended Edition
description: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Director's Cut
description: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Director's Cut is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!

name: The Wired Narrative Bundle
description:
Includes :
The Town Of Light
Martha Is Dead
Those Who Remain
Close To The Sun
The Last Worker
Deliver Us The Moon
Tin Hearts

name: Pursuit Force
description:
Experience Pursuit Force originally released on the PlayStation Portable system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Five vicious gangs are fighting for control of Capital City. The terrified public has given up hope – and the Chief of Police wants results, fast!

Jump into action as a member of the elite Pursuit Force and rid the state of corruption. Dive behind the wheel of a truck, a speedboat or even a helicopter as you hunt down criminals and recover stolen goods.

This title has been converted from the PSP version to the PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 consoles and provides newly added features.

name: Syphon Filter: Logan's Shadow
description: A port of Syphon Filter: Logan’s Shadow, originally released on the PlayStation Portable system, featuring optimised rendering, rewind, quick saving, and custom video filters.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Ebusco Bus Pack
description: A new bus manufacturer just appeared! Ebusco is here to stay and for you to drive around Angel Shores and Seaside Valley. The Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Ebusco Bus Pack includes three new buses as well as six new interior designs.

name: Scramble All Fighters
description: Amazing graphics. Countless different units. An addictive Battle Pass. We have none of those things. Just one carrier and as many tiny fighters as you can muster to hold back hordes of enemy fighters and bombers. Victory is not enough - you may win the battle, but still lose the war!

name: NBF0
description: A simple, fun, FPS where you must advance through waves of evil robots. Use your energy weapons to fight them and escape to freedom!

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Official Map Extension
description: Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Map Extension DLC is free and extends the "Angel Shores" map with a huge new area. The mountainous nature reserve offers numerous new campaign missions, new stops, and more!

name: The King of Fighters XV: Character "Sylvie Paula Paula"
description: This character is also bundled together in the available The King of Fighters XV Fighter Pass DLC character set.

name: Cute Puzzles!!!
description: Cute Puzzles!!! The game is very simple, you have to collect a picture, which consists of 20 elements.

name: Atomic Survivors
description: Atomic Survivors is an arena shooter with minimalistic gameplay and simplistic roguelike elements in which you have to fend off many waves of opponents. Collect Resin every run to buy one of several upgrades of your choice. And remember: for best results, choose wisely.

name: Midnight Cycle in Muxi Town
description: What kind of work is this? This is an experimental multi storyline game. The work tells a science fiction story about consciousness implantation and simulated biological experiments. The work consists of a mixture of 22 storylines, 3 types of reincarnation endings, and 1 main ending.

name: The Dark Book
description: An obscure old-school rpg - Single player offline with a skeleton warrior

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Dracula
description:
Dracula and the Sisters slowly drain you of your power!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Dracula - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Return of Rome
description:
Welcome to Return of Rome, a completely new type of expansion pack which brings Age of Empires, the title that started it all, into Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition as a brand new self-contained experience. This new expansion will allow you to challenge friends with the original sixteen Age of Empires civilizations - plus one brand-new Return of Rome exclusive civilization, the Lac Viet- and relive the triumph and trials of antiquity. Battle your way across the ancient world with three new campaigns featuring conquerors, empire-builders, and gifted tacticians fighting desperately against fate! As an additional bonus, the Romans will no longer be bound by time as they become a new playable civilization within Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition, ready to battle in the new Age.

Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Return of Rome is the fourth expansion of Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition. It was announced on 25 October 2022, on the 25th Anniversary of Age of Empires. It ports Age of Empires content into the Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition client.

name: LEGO 2K Drive: Awesome Rivals Edition
description:
LEGO 2K Drive Awesome Rivals Edition includes:

# Aquadirt Racer Pack
# Year 1 Drive Pass: Includes Season 1, 2, 3 and 4 DLC packs. the Awesome Pizza Vehicle. Release timing of the DLC contents will be revealed at a future date.
# Awesome Bonus Pack: Includes Wheelie Stunt Driver Minifigure, Machio Beast Vehicle and a Vehicle Flair.
# 550 Coins
# 3 Day Early Access
# Awesome Rivals Bonus Pack: Includes Royal Sailor, Royal Outtaliner, Royal People Rover Street Car, Reckless Scorpion Stunt Driver Minifigure, Hamburghini Royale and Vehicle Flair.

name: LEGO 2K Drive: Awesome Edition
description:
LEGO 2K Drive Awesome Edition includes:

# Aquadirt Racer Pack
# Year 1 Drive Pass: Includes Season 1, 2, 3 and 4 DLC packs. the Awesome Pizza Vehicle. Release timing of the DLC contents will be revealed at a future date.
# 550 Coins
# Awesome Bonus Pack: Includes Wheelie Stunt Driver Minifigure, Machio Beast Vehicle and a Vehicle Flair.
# 3 Day Early Access

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Gold Edition
description: Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Gold Edition offers new bus fans an all-in-one package. In addition to Bus Simulator 21, it includes all previously released premium DLCs, as well as the free Next Stop update and its numerous game improvements, brand-new game mode, and official map extension.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop
description: It's your stop! Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop is here! Enjoy many game improvements and a brand-new game mode with this comprehensive update. Career Mode combines Sandbox Mode with the campaign's economic system. Download the update now and experience Bus Simulator 21 anew.

name: Thalassic
description: Thalassic is a VR underwater horror survival game where you explore an planet a few thousand years after its evacuation. Explore the depths of this new world ocean with your capsule communicator George. Encounter different creatures as you go deeper and find what lurks down in the depths.

name: Gods of Savvarah: Part 1
description: Gods of Savvarah is a visual novel with the philosophy of a classic fantasy RPG. Defeat enemies, explore countries, make friends, and find your place in Savvarah.

name: SubwaySim Hamburg
description: Explore the picturesque U3 line of Hamburg's elevated railroad in SubwaySim Hamburg!

name: Taimanin Gogo!
description: Sin descripción

name: Live Art
description: Hold to draw, avoid the obstacles, and bring the arts to life! Super easy to understand but very challenging and packed with tons of fun.

name: Hand of Doom
description: Sign a contract in blood! Travel throughout the planes of existence slaying or befriending powerful doomlords in this wizard simulator inspired by the FMV games and dungeon crawlers of the early 90's. Learn powerful spells to solve puzzles and combat the dark forces amassing against you.

name: Poor Lucas and the Evil Duke
description: Poor Lucas and the Evil Duke is a Metroidvania with action and RPG elements. Jump, slide, wall jump, swim, and battle your way through the Dukedom. Other mechanics include pushing boxes, pulling levers, and swinging on ropes.

name: Wee Tanks!
description: Wee Tanks! is a game where you get to battle hundreds of tanks on many different maps. It is an homage to the original game and gives you more tanks, more missions and more game modes! It even has a built-in map editor.

name: Kargast
description: Kargast is a dark narrative exploration game with light RPG elements, branching endings, and a semi-satirical view of narrative RPGs. It tells the story of an unwell child on the brink of death, and his adventures through his surreal, cryptic surroundings.

name: Hrot
description: Hrot is a single-player retro FPS set in a small socialist country neighboring Soviet Union (Czechoslovakia) after an unspecified disaster in 1986. Those times were dark and terrifying and so is the game.

name: Super Bunny Man
description:
A physics-based couch-coop platformer about a guy in a rabbit costume. Beat levels, time attacks, find hidden carrots, all while evading spikes, boulders, pitfalls, and other challenges.

Play campaign mode in singleplayer or co-op with a friend, or play deathmatch with up to 4 players.

name: People Jumping Tower
description: "People Jumping Tower" is a casual-indie game that tests the player's athletic abilities and challenges them to beat their own records.

name: Little Planet
description:
Little Planet (LP) is a 3D life-simulation, and role-playing game for VR headsets that will let you escape into a fairytale, charming, ever-growing world full of fun, items, creatures, and wonder or play whenever and wherever you want with yourself or friends.

Live your dream new life, develop relationships with adorable characters, craft or trade versatile, beautiful items which you can use in-game and explore with old /new friends, or find a spot to enjoy yourself for sunset!

name: Beat the Clock: Hardcore
description: This is the hardcore version of Beat The Clock. You may have beaten the clock before, but now you need to do it on a larger scale. 24 hours of scale.

name: Stand and Fight
description: Stand and Fight is a mobile game where you are a character who can control the spirits of his ancestors and use the power of his traditions to protect his town's June festival, which is under attack by a large corporation.

name: Campfire Cat Cafe
description: A purrfectly relaxing game! Start your cafe in the forest. Hire adorable cat staff. Cook delicious authentic foods from around the world! Attract and serve cute animal customers and laugh at their furry funny stories. Relax and earn tips as your kitten staff works while you're idle.

name: Bubble Bird
description: Bubble Bird is a simple yet addictive game that is great for both adults and kids to play. She perfectly develops reaction and the ability to make quick decisions.

name: That's a Cow: Premium Edition
description: Soar through the air and don't get milked in this cute game.

name: Mornin' Joe!
description: A café memory puzzle game for the Playdate!

name: Digscovery
description: An artifact is just out of sight... why not dig for it!

name: Dog Knowse Chapter 1: The Dame
description: A short cyberpunk noir tale created for Playjam3.

name: Hidden
description: A PlayJam 3 entry about homelessness.

name: Stalk the Giant
description: Deliver pizza to clowns to support your caffeine addiction and stalk the giant!

name: Sight Blight
description: A small game about saving Elves from a horrible laser death.

name: Last Labyrinth: Lucidity Lost
description: An escape adventure game in which you work with "Katia," a girl who speaks a mysterious language, to escape from a hall where death traps are set.

name: Naval Action: Rotterdam
description: "Rotterdam" is a beautiful and heavily armed West Indiaman built for the Rotterdam chamber of the Geoctrooieerde Westindische Compagnie.

name: Thea 2: Rat Tales & More
description: The long-awaited DLC for Thea 2: The Shattering containing new stories, characters, classes, and pets.

name: Edemn: Cyborg Skeleton
description: A metallic cyborg designed to destroy everything in its path.

name: Clicks Of Courage
description: Clicks of Courage is an action RPG. You must guide your hero in a medieval fantasy world and destroy other factions to win the competition for domination.

name: Kongming's Fiendish Maze
description: When you enter Kongming's fiendish maze you have 15 minutes to escape. Pick up a weapon to kill enemies. Find the health crate to restore your health. Use the mini map to guide you. Follow the clues to freedom. It's just you against the maze. Good luck!

name: Aker Fern: Rdzeń Szatrisa - The Shatris Core.
description: As Mikołaj Fern I have been travelling and experiencing many adventures along the way. I was considered an antagonist by most of people from that era. Over five hundred years have passed until I came back to live as Dan Tern. As him I will lead a certain story that never reached its definitive end.

name: Xenosis
description: Xenosis is a thrilling metroidvania where you traverse an ancient temple that has been overrun by alien creatures. Armed with your blaster, you must combat a variety of challenging enemies and upgrade your weapon to escape

name: Across The Void
description: Across The Void is an exciting new roguelike video game that will take you on a journey through a universe of endless possibilities. Featuring randomly generated maps and side maps, the game offers a new adventure every time you play. With a unique skill system, players can create their own playstyle by investing in three different trees, each with its own set of skills tailored to different playstyles. With over 50 skills to unlock, you can customize your character to your liking and take on the universe on your own terms.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Toys
description: Puzzles of toys!

name: Shadow of the Treasure
description: A fantasy pseudo-card game of 15 levels that tests your thinking and combinatorial skills.

name: Glypha: Vintage
description: A fast-paced, Egyptian-themed jousting tournament recalls 1980's classic arcade action.

name: Thereafter
description: You play as a stray black cat, abandoned in a dark alleyway. Your goal is to find and untangle the mysteries of several lost spirits in order to fulfill their journey into the afterlife.

name: Tap Shap
description: Tap Shap is a unique, free-to-play, addictive game & the world's first multi-platform reaction game!

name: Missile Collector Man
description: Play game. Solve puzzle. Collect missile.

name: Gezeichnet: Unsere Flucht 1945
description: Gezeichnet: Unsere Flucht 1945 ist ein emotionales, atmosphärisches Survival-Adventure mit einem Fokus auf Narrative und lebendig gemachter Historie.

name: Toon Toon Racing
description: Toon Toon Racing is a stylized racing game with pretty cool physics and music. Choose your car and get ready!

name: Crimson Song
description: It was only meant to be another annual visit to his mother's grave, but midway through Diandrir's story was shrouded in darkness. A kinect visual novel about darkness and girls' love.

name: V-Hunter Puzzler DX
description: Hunt a plethora of monsters using unique items in a dynamic turn-based grid puzzler! Complete the bite-sized levels in as few turns as possible and help V-Hunter defeat the evil vampire Alric!

name: Burst Hero
description: Burst Hero is a pixel roguelike shooting survival game. You can choose heroes with different abilities and use various weapons to resist a steady stream of enemies. In the battle, you can customize your build by weapons bullets and cards. Each battle will have different experiences and challenges.

name: End of Night
description: 1943. You are sitting in a boat with Josef, rowing from Nazi-occupied Denmark to safety in neutral Sweden. As he crosses the ocean, the sea gives way to the streets and people that populate his mind. Your journey becomes a living landscape of recollections from the night of his escape.

name: Cook Serve Forever
description: Cook your way through the bustling solarpunk city of Helianthus as Nori Kaga, a food cart chef aspiring to make it big like her role model, the Culinary Queen herself, Chef Rhubarb.

name: Soul Delivery
description: A robot with amnesia ventures through the night of a neon city without humans in search of what happened between humans and AI.

name: Humanity
