description: A unique blend of puzzle-solving and action-platforming. Play a lone Shiba Inu charged with commanding massive, marching crowds to the goal in Story Mode, or browse a wide array of user-made levels crafted via the in-game Stage Creator!

name: Treasures of Oz
description:
Developed by Family Entertainment and Published by World Of Games, this animated tale of the beloved classic has a new twist on an old favorite by having mini games to play throughout the story!

Starring Diana Ross as the Narrator, and animation voice legend Cam Clarke, star of over 50 cartoons, including Leonardo and Rocksteady of the 80's Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle cartoon!

name: I No Longer Fear The Ranger Guarding My Heel
description: A large prototype-textured map with non-linear progression, slaughter fights, and trick jumping. Runs on the Copper mod, which is included. Originally intended as an entry for SM224.

name: Hoshizora Tensei Another Sky
description: A free online card game playable in your browser.

name: Love, Death and PvP
description: From average high schooler to powerful hero—you've just become a member of the strongest party in the newest VRMMORPG, Inferno, after accidentally kill-stealing from one of the most powerful players. Join forces with a selfish but strong dark knight, a kind mage who tends to go overboard, and a self-proclaimed treasure hunter with social anxiety, and embark on a journey to defeat the final boss!

name: Ritual Bound
description: Deep in the forest, the witches watch over a prison, keeping an Old Horror sealed. Tonight, the seals binding it must be renewed... But there's a problem.

name: Remember to Remember
description: Remember to Remember is a Yume Nikki fangame by emrbt. You play as Pale, a boy with amnesia who is staying in a hospital.

name: Orb Flight
description: Fly and collect all of the glowing orbs. Meditative Flight & exploration game with relaxing music.

name: Not In My Cave
description: Defend Yourself! Not in my cave is the last line of defense to protect your magical spells from unrelenting attacks from the undead and goblin hordes. In this action based tower defense style game protect your spell books from being looted and leaving yourself defenseless!

name: Tales of Vogar: Lost Descendants
description: Go on an emotional adventure in the kingdom of Vogar, a once beautiful land filled with magic but now devastated by war. Discover the secrets behind the Ascension, reclaim your homeland and take revenge in this story-driven RPG with a turn-based battle system. Free the people of Vogar from tyranny!

name: Superfluous Returnz
description: The adventures of Superfluous, a very useless superhero in a peaceful village in the deep French countryside ... Helped by his assistant Sophie, who tries to somehow temper the enthusiasm of his employer, he will try to apprehend the mysterious apple thief who is terrorizing the local orchards ...

name: Memento in Marrow
description:
A girl has a strange wish, a will she wishes to carry on even after her present is over. How far will Yori go to have it carried out? Can Thelma even help with something so bizarre? Can something so wrong possibly feel so right?

A kinetic visual novel about two girls who try to make the best of things, and certainly, things could be much better.

name: Hero World
description: You've always wanted to be a hero, and now's your time. Help Tom save his sister Lisa and prove yourself as a hero. It's up to you to rescue Lisa. Are you brave enough to accept the challenge and save her in Hero World?

name: Only You Can Prevent Containment Breaches
description: Medium to large, semi-linear level with a dungeon ruin inside an underground base. Includes some custom audio and music.

name: Apricity
description: Chiara leads a solitary life, barred from stepping out during winter due to the mythical dangers that lurk within. But her curiosity gets the better of her, and she escapes to catch a glimpse of the famous Starflake flowers before they disappear when Spring arrives. That's when she stumbles upon the fabled snow spirit, and a strange bond begins to blossom between them...

name: Groceries and JumpScares
description: Can you survive the horrors of retail? You are the newest "employee" under contract at the local Soke Co Groceries Store. Manage the amount of stock daily to try to satisfy the on slot of customers. Mark the price up on products to make more profit and buy more stock. All while quelling the hunger of the thing that lurks in the basement. Try to survive and remember the Soke Co Groceries motto. Try Not To Get Eaten!

name: Salary Man Mario
description: Mario’s just an everyday salary man, and now’s the time to prove yourself! Bowser has kidnapped your boss, and it’s up to you to rescue him! Do a good enough job, and you might just get a bonus for your trouble!

name: Thunder
description:
Thunder is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are running in the middle of a thunderstorm. Collect the stars that form when lightning strikes the ground to score points. But avoid getting hit by lightning. Reverse your direction by pressing a button or by hitting the sides of the screen.

The game is over when you get struck.

name: Truck Climb Racing
description: This is no place for the weak. Only true truck drivers manage to overcome their limits in the most adverse conditions on roads that defy physics and their skills.

name: Furry Femboys
description: Furry Femboys... Your dream coming true...

name: Deco Deck
description: Deco Deck is a new logic puzzle from the creator of Semantle. Your goal is to link the cards on the board in connected groups of five, such that each group makes a valid "hand".

name: Sol: Last Light
description: Sol: Last Light is a third-person, action-adventure RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world. Learn to control your newly discovered power to harness energy from the sun and battle against robots on your journey up the mountain to find your captured sister.

name: Obscurite Magie: The Blood of Kings
description: Lietta Fane, a swordswoman and adventurer, is on a mission to find the killer of her swordmaster who raised her like a father.

name: Monthly Entertainment
description: Monthly Entertainment (Short: Monthly Enter) or MonthlyIdol2 is a gatcha-style Korean idol management game created by Sora Ryoo and 608Factory. The goal of the Game is to become the president of an entertainment agency and nurture your artist while building up your agency.

name: Escape the City
description: Silva's first map

name: The Binding of Isaac: Fall from Grace
description:
Do you have what it takes to keep it cool in the Boiler?

Face off against brand new challenges in this alternate floor to the Downpour! Weave through seas of steam, and slay blistered freaks in this mod, which has been created by some of those who have worked on mods such as Fiend Folio and Revelations!

name: Clue/Cluedo: Black Adder Resort Bundle
description: Step into new Crime Scenes. Use your skills of deduction to unravel the mystery and find out who did it, with what weapon, where. It's the original crime-solving classic with new investigation formats exclusive to the video game. Solve every case and become the detective you want to be!

name: Truck Preparation For Driving VR Training
description: Train your professional skills inTruck Preparation For Driving VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

name: Monster Battle
description: Monster Battle is retro, monster shooter where the player eliminates monsters and arcade style bosses. Collect power-ups while vanquishing foes in 12 unique levels.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Ultimate Edition
description: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Waluigi Moveset
description: A custom moveset mod for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate which adds in Waluigi into the game.

name: FPS1
description: A short game about using an explosive bolt gun. Pin enemies with the bolt gun, then when the time is right, explode them!

name: Classmates
description:
June goes over to her classmate, Ian's house, to hand him some study notes. Soon enough, she finds herself unable to leave...

Help June escape by solving puzzles, and hiding from her kidnapper.

name: Haunted Legends: The Call of Despair - Collector's Edition
description: People in Nulver Town are turning into crystal and more appear on the streets each day! Can you find out who's behind these strange transformations and save the town before it's too late?

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Mexico City
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Rio de Janeiro
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Castles And Palaces 4
description: Majestic buildings and architecture from different eras. Assemble puzzles and enjoy great pictures.

name: Rainbow Runner
description: It's time to take a run on the rainbow of colors and fun!

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Special Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 06
description: Season 2 Episode 6: Crescent High School Friend Club! To make up for becoming a Loser again, Pizza Boy helps throw a housewarming party for Holden's new roommate.

name: Haunted Horror Stories: Gone With The Wind
description:
HHS: Gone With The Wind is a single player game with psx era aesthetics.
An authentic retro horror with music, fixed cameras, environment, graphics, filters, and gameplay faithful to its aesthetics.

name: Editor-dle
description: A 5-letter word based guessing game based around video editing terms.

name: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion - Girls Nite Out Fashion Pack
description: Expand Bratz Magazine by reporting on your recent travels with a world-renowned designer and rock new looks from the Girls Nite Out collection.

name: Angel Legion: Lil Lily - Purple
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: MailPop
description: A Clicker where you will try to send an email while getting rid of annoying pop-ups that will flood your screen. The perfect warm-up to hone your aim between games! Have you ever wanted to punch those annoying ads in the face? NOW YOU CAN!

name: No Ghost in Sky Elevator
description: It is a strange high-rise elevator. The objects that appear and the people you board are all strange. Depending on your actions, you will face a variety of consequences.

name: Sweet Forest Guardian
description: Sweet Forest Guardian－Is a card + real-time tactics game. Players have to combine their own decks to defeat the enemy, and after winning the battle, they can save their lovely elf companions.

name: Blindsight: War of the Wardens
description: Blindsight: War of the Wardens, a story-driven action-adventure game where you play as Iggy, a martial arts master with echolocation abilities, as he retrieves a stolen family heirloom that may bring unintended consequences to the universe.

name: Storm Warfare
description: Get ready to rewrite history with Storm Warfare, the free-to-play WW2 strategy card game. Fight on epic WW2 battlefronts, collect cards, and truly own and trade your in-game assets.

name: Fusion Paradox
description: Defy the ancient goddess of war and free the Agency from the forces and anomalies that have captured it in this scrolling shooter and action roguelike game

name: Quest for the Golden Candelabra
description: Lead a group of childhood friends in a series of difficult encounters played under the rules of PF2E, the second edition of a powerful tabletop OGL ruleset.

name: Hidden Bunny
description: Hidden object puzzle game where you need to find all the bunnies

name: Cluck: Hat Pack 3
description: Fight your enemies while having an awesome style! This hat pack includes 16 hats. If you like these hats you should get this as this pack costs 50% less than the total cost of each hat in-game!

name: Little Disaster
description: This cute little disaster is bursting with big fun and challenge

name: Absurdika
description: It's time for you to overcome the fear of conflicts. Every time someone blamed you you stood quiet and kept your anger inside. The demon you are about to face impersonates this fear.

name: Touhou: Gensokyo Survivors
description: Youkai have overrun Gensokyo! There's no resolving this incident, just try to survive! Touhou: Gensokyo Survivors is the latest take on the survivor genre, this time with the unique twist of a grid-based inventory system. Hoard as many items as possible if you want to survive!

name: Angus and the Gates of Chaos
description: An exciting and comedic retro adventure!

name: Space Guardian
description: Robots have launched an attack on humans, and the space guardian force is dispatched to fight to defend the earth! This is a fast-paced arcade-style casual car battle game. The levels are all randomly generated by the program and can be challenged forever.

name: Iso Racer
description: Iso Racer is a top-down multiplayer racing game with a focus on realistic driving physics combined with drifting. It features a variety of circuits, cars, and the ability to personalize and upgrade vehicles. It's a great pick-up-and-play experience for both casual and hardcore racing fans.

name: Logicats
description: Logicats is a beginner-friendly programming game. Learn programming concepts through reading code in a fun and effective way. Perfect for classrooms or at home. Start your programming journey today!

name: Tamayura Mirai
description: There is a girl, searching for something she lost... Tamayura Mirai is a midsummer fantasy visual novel of humans, spirits, and sorcerers that's won several industry awards in Japan.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom - Collector's Edition
description:
The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is the sequel to The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. The setting for Link’s adventure has been expanded to include the skies above the vast lands of Hyrule.

The collector's edition includes the following:
- The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom (physical version)
- Artbook
- SteelBook case
- Steel Poster
- A set of four pin badges.

name: StarRaver
description: Hang out with your friends and party in this sci-fi music experience! Visit the unique clubs defining Starcade Arcade and enjoy the casual multiplayer party games in each room.

name: Assault on Proxima
description: Lock and load with Strike Force Delta in this action-packed sci-fi FPS! Play solo or team up to blast through hordes of Gacrux alien invaders, save humanity’s colonies, and dominate intense PvP showdowns. Gear up, soldier, and get ready to lead the Assault on Proxima!

name: Drift: Space Survival
description: Drift is a co-op survival adventure set in a mysterious asteroid field. Craft, build and explore alone or with friends to rebuild the technology you lost when your research ship crashed.

name: Despot's Game: Challenges
description: Twenty missions on a lunar test site - nothing random, just pure strategy.

name: BountyHeart
description:
BountyHeart is a mobile roguelite puzzle RPG that combines Match 3 with Tactics. You play as Tobi, a criminal who has been sent to the island of BountyHeart, fabled to contain the Legendary Bounty. The only ticket to freedom is to capture the Legendary Bounty!
Assemble the perfect crew by befriending those you meet along the way, or defeat them for their bounty and strengthen your party.

name: Emiko's Pledge 3
description: Emiko's Pledge 3 is a 2D Platform Action game based on the story of a half demon girl called Emiko, whose aim is to become the greatest warrior of the Ettaze state and abroad and also, to protect the weak.

name: Cluck
description: Cluck is an extremely fast-paced fps arena shooter. Spawn with only a pistol and find weapons, armor, health and powerups such as the Quack and Speed along the map. Jump pads and portals are also around the map, enabling you to get to your destination. And customize your own chicken!

name: The Ranch of Rivershine
description: Saddle up and build your own horse ranch! Raise foals, care for your horses and train them as you explore the western wilderness! Participate in cross country competitions and become your town's champion. Befriend the villagers who'll help you on your adventure at the Ranch of Rivershine!

name: Eggy Party
description: Follow the Eggies in an action-packed, egg-citinh world! Crack the competition in this multiplayer fuelled battle royale party game and be the last Eggy standing!

name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is the sequel to The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. The setting for Link’s adventure has been expanded to include the skies above the vast lands of Hyrule.

name: Bum Simulator
description:
You lost everything and ended up on the streets. What will you do? Adapt and survive? Take revenge on those responsible? Become an urban legend?

Bum Simulator is a sandbox game bursting with inappropriate humor and memorable characters. Apart from day-to-day survival, you can enjoy many unique features.

You can throw pigeons at people and watch as the panic ensues. Not fun enough? Upgrade your birds with explosives and let chaos reign. Still not satisfied? Wait until you see the fully upgraded pigeonado skill…

name: Speedmapping Pack 224: Prototype Jam #4
description: 9 speedmaps using prototype resources

name: Grabage
description:
Play as a mischievous, trash-hoarding raccoon in Grabage – a 3D free-for-all multiplayer platformer. Roll and fling yourself through fun fantasy environments, racing against your friends to collect the most junk. Recycle your trash into beautiful furniture and decorate to your heart's content!

Winner of Falmouth Games Expo 2023 Industry and People's Choice awards!

name: B3
description: B3 will be a first-person VR shooter where you have to defend your base from waves of attacking monsters.

name: Euclid's Nightmare
description: Venture deep into the darkest depths of my mind. Experience the torture and mental anguish that comes with these dangerous visions from my mind. Hence the title of this mod; Euclid's Nightmare. It features 20 brand-spanking-new maps all hand-crafted by me

name: Chunithm Sun Plus
description: An expanded version of Chunithm Sun.

name: Just Thanks
description: The last Super Mario World ROM hack made by MURA before his retirement as a modder.

name: Seal M
description:
Seal Online comes to mobile as Seal M!

Immerse yourself in a vibrant and enchanting world filled with whimsical monsters and characters!

name: Romgadr
description:
This is a mini-game shmup.
Defeat all 20 mid-bosses.
When the last boss is defeated, it is the end.

name: Monster Rampage VR
description: Welcome to Monster Rampage - a VR shooter game. You must use all of your skills and resources to defend yourself against the invasion of monsters.

name: Real Time Assist Replay Time
description: "Real Time Assist Replay Time" is a slot machine simulator.

name: Sphere Guider
description: Dark Souls but a Ball.

name: Lotion Samurai for Nintendo Switch
description:
LotionSamurai for Nintendo Switch" is a remake of all stages of "Lotion Samurai" and "Shin Lotion Samurai" currently available on Steam and ported to Nintendo Switch.
The main character is Nobunaga Oda, whose entire body is overflowing with lubricant.
The main content is Time Attack.

name: Airborne Bundle
description: Get Trailmakers alonside our biggest expansion to date: Trailmakers: Airborne

name: Tohou Spell Bubble: Touhou Youyoumu Arrangements Pack Vol.2
description: Touhou Youyoumu Arrangements Pack Vol.2 is a collection of popular arrangement tracks from the rhythm game including "What About Progress?", "Necrofantasia: Arr.Demetori" and more.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Touhou Project Arrangements Pack 8
description: A new pack featuring 10 arranged songs, navigators, and avatars from Touhou Project!

name: Heartbeat Hospital: Love, Lies, and Betrayal
description: A visual novel where decisions matter. Love, lies, and betrayal await in this gripping interactive story. Multiple endings!

name: After You: Level Escape
description: "After You: Level Escape" is a narrative game with puzzles, but it is not an easy game, here you will not have indicators or tutorials, nor can you save when you want. In "After You - Level Escape" you need to put all your attention and use paper and pencil to move forward, if you're looking for an easy game, this is not your game.

name: The Empress of Mahjong
description: The Empress invites you to play! Immerse yourself in the amazingly beautiful locations of Asia and complete mahjong levels approved by the Empress herself!

name: Manas
description: Manas is an action-adventure game set in medieval Central Asia that immerses you in a land of mountains, valleys, and nomadic culture. Inspired by the Kyrgyz epic of the legendary hero, Manas, you'll defend your village against ruthless invaders with the aid of your faithful steed, Akkula. Through engaging visuals and innovative mounted combat, witness the beginning of Manas' epic journey!

name: DriftCE
description:
DriftCE is the definitive drifting simulation videogame.

Take the car to your garage, where you can make major modifications to it. Customising the car, swapping various parts and performing crucial changes tangibly affects car’s performances and behaviours on the track. Replace engine, suspension and exhaust parts yourself to achieve the right performance for your driving style! Create a one of a kind car with visual tuning - change body kits, paint color and decals.

A simulative experience, carefully recreated to deliver the same feeling real drifters get. A fully immersive drifting simulation - with real licensed cars and tracks - featuring different drifting styles: power drift, handbrake and clutch kick.

name: BlockMill
description:
Get ready to own buildings, streets or even neighborhoods in BlockMill, the exciting new social game and platform where real estate meets the virtual world! Blurring the lines of reality and the metaverse, in BlockMill you can buy any building you love from the real world around you, with everyone playing on the same map.

BlockMill is packed with fun missions and challenges that reward you with upgrades, alternatively, skip ahead and buy items that enable you to customize your buildings in ways you never thought possible.. Want to make your home higher than a skyscraper or add a picture of your beloved pet to the roof, or how about snagging a rival sports stadium for your own personal use? The sky really is the limit! If you want to switch up, you can trade buildings with other players, or even gift buildings to friends and family.

And the best part? BlockMill is super accessible and can be played on any device, anywhere in the world, without any downloads! So whether you're on your computer, phone, or tablet, you can start building your global real estate empire today!

name: Flappy Souls
description: A mix of Flappy Bird and Dark Souls

name: C.B.T
description: C.B.T (Crazy Ball Time) is a ball-rolling platformer, with crazy tough action, and even crazier Balls.

name: Play With Me
description: Use whatever you can think of to destroy al the different objects that are keeping you away from playing with your human, but you will have to be fast because you have twenty minutes before he gets back home. Will you be able to make it?

name: Fritz&Chesster: learn to play chess Vol. 1 - Edition 2023
description: Strategic thinking, tricky brain-training, exciting competitive situations, lots of fun and a good serving of chess knowledge - all this and more in this unique, international award-winning chess adventure game.

name: Mutant Mudds Collection + Xeodrifter
description: Four acclaimed games. One convenient bundle.

name: Rolling Toolman
description: You are Toolman inside ball. Roll and try to reach goal as soon as you can and avoid falling from map and beware obstacles

name: Kirby's Dream Land 2 DX
description: Kirby's Dream Land 2 DX is an extensive hack of the original game that offers a fully colorized version of the classic Game Boy platformer. Enjoy the colorful and charming adventure of Kirby and his animal friends as they explore seven worlds and face the evil Dark Matter. This edition features full colorization of the original monochrome graphics, customization options through a new settings menu, and eliminated slow down for a smoother gameplay experience.

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: Blood Storm
description: Marvel's Midnight Suns: Blood Storm is the fourth and final DLC expansion for Marvel's Midnight Suns. Released in May 2023, this DLC introduces the character Storm from the X-Men as a fully playable hero. The expansion adds new story missions centred around Storm's abilities to control the weather and her role in the fight against Lilith's demonic forces.

name: Zombie Dead Smasher
description: Grab your gun and get ready to defeat the hideous zombies in this thrilling game.

name: I Swear this Hentai Game was a Gift
description: A relaxing puzzle game with cute anime girls. You didn't buy this game; it was a gift. We believe you.

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 15
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 20 art pieces to choose from, and 2000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Borefest
description: "Why would you waste your time making this? Couldn't you have made something fun instead? Games are supposed to be fun..." - The Game Developer's Dad

name: In Freedom Rest Ideal Tomorrows
description: Lead your group of warriors in a unique country (procedurally generated), where looting cities and facing guards is just the beginning. With each victory, increase your power, preparing to face the king and take control of the area. Are you ready to go for the victory?

name: Menseki: Area Maze Search
description: Menseki is back, but with a new brain-boggling twist!

name: Matches Puzzle: Classic Logic Arcade
description: The classic matchstick puzzle is a real training of logic and brain!

name: The Unfallens: Awakening
description: Returning from exile underground, a shattered world awaits you. The once-thriving civilization of Unfallens now lies in ruins. The ruthless guardian wait to attack. Journey through remains, use your skills to overcome intense boss battles. Awaken your true power. Reclaim what was lost.

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 - Deluxe Edition
description: The sequel to the captivating tale of Fuga: Melodies of Steel has arrived! This turn-based RPG is back with a ramped up battle system for more strategy, as well as a brand new event system that gives you more thrilling choices to affect your experience!

name: Max Reckoning: A Criminal Thief Story With Shooter & Quest
description: The game tells the story of two friends who wanted to change their lives and get rich in a not entirely legal way. The protagonist, being more experienced and confident, goes out to rob a bank alone, which later turns out to be a bad idea.

name: Outpost
description: this is a tower defence game,we need upgrade our weapons to fight waves of enemies,robots can mining diamonds,and we need spent those in many aspect，features of this game: 1 return back before dager comes,2tempory upgrade are important but permanent upgrade are better

name: Crusader Kings III: Tours and Tournaments
description:
Life is a journey of chivalric adventure, so why don’t you embrace yours, ruler? Create your very own epic story with the major expansion, Crusader Kings III: Tours & Tournaments. Be awed by the sights and events that await you, from bold, mock combat in the jousting area to adventuring perilous wilds with your royal entourage.

Let wanderlust overtake your ruler’s desires during a monumental Tour, and seek out your subjects in a realm that can be both dangerous and richly entertaining. Prove yourself in one of the many forms of gallant Tournaments, either abroad or at home, or use the festivities to murder a quarrelsome rival. Be the host of new Grand Activities, be it grand weddings or stirring falconry hunts. But beware! Many celebrations are the perfect cover for the perfect scheme against foes… or family.

Be the host of new Grand Activities, be it grand weddings or stirring falconry hunts. But beware! Many celebrations are the perfect cover for the perfect scheme against foes… or family.

name: Another Fisherman's Tale
description: Another mind-bending VR adventure in Another Fisherman's Tale, a poetic story with unique VR puzzle mechanics. Control limbs, solve puzzles, explore new locations & discover the truth. A follow-up to the award-winning A Fisherman's Tale.

name: Local News with Cliff Rockslide
description: Welcome to Local News, it's the small-town-celebrity Cliff Rockslide (seven subscribers, ahem) with his trustworthy cameraperson, YOU!

name: Leap From Hell
description: In this first-person puzzle platformer you will try to figure out the right way through each level and afterwards can try to improve your timings by finiding hidden paths and secret short cuts. Your goals are to sucessfully finish a level as well as to beat the fastest time of our level designers.

name: TT Isle of Man: Ride on the Edge 3
description: The Isle of Man Tourist Trophy is the most epic, most dangerous and most spectacular race in the world. It is a course of over 60km on the roads of the Isle of Man, includes 264 bends, and requires high-powered bikes specially prepared for the race. The riders who compete in it train their whole lives for the chance to win the ultimate accolade: being crowned champion of the Isle of Man TT.

name: Voodolls
description: Voodolls is a co-op tower defence experience steeped in the dark & mysterious world of voodoo. Trapped in the jaws of hell, four souls are given the chance of freedom by a mysterious voodoo priest who distils their essence into voodoo dolls. Take up their offer and begin your break for freedom!

name: Wheels of War
description: The Wheels of War is a Warfare Game. The unique way of war Fight between multiple vehicles. Players explore the world and survive with their team. Plenty of game modes are available to play with cross-platform.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Hero of Justice: Pack 2
description: Play as characters from the Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero movie! Gohan (Beast), Orange Piccolo, and Piccolo (Power Awakening) are available in addition to Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, Costumes, Extra Missions featuring characters from the Hero of Justice Pack Set, and more!

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2
description: The sequel to the captivating tale of Fuga: Melodies of Steel has arrived! This turn-based RPG is back with a ramped up battle system for more strategy, as well as a brand new event system that gives you more thrilling choices to affect your experience!

name: Herodes
description: It's 2197, and humanity faces a mysterious disease that cannot be cured by any treatment already known. There's only one option left: brute force. You must enter the body of Pacient Zero, find the source of the disease and destroy it before it is too late.

name: Band Camp Boyfriend
description: Forge new friendships, become a leader, and maybe even find love all while trying to survive band camp!

name: Project: Drift
description: Drift on the famous mountain roads in Japan! Driving various Japanese cars! Challenge local fleets!

name: Abalon
description: Abalon is a roguelike adventure that fuses tactical turn-based combat and card strategy. Choose your summoner and explore a tabletop world to discover its secrets. Build the perfect deck, outsmart your enemies and become legend!

name: Clover's Space Beat
description: Clover’s Space Beat is a gay lewd rhythm space shooter game in which you take control of Clover in his quest to stop Doctor Deadbeat. You’ll get help from Miller, the engineer and mothership pilot and the Colonel of the Dance Federation.

name: Family Tree!
description: Sin descripción

name: Bizarro Untergrund
description:
A game written by Optimus6128 for 3DO using his own 3D engine called Bizarro Engine.

It is an early version made for the Retro Platform Jam #6, not entirely finished and the engine is not optimized yet to handle the big sprawling caves. Early versions of it with very small rooms or caves would run a bit better, but near the end he decided to draw some more corridors and cave as he thought it was very small for a level.

You basically use your particle weapon to mine gems of four kinds. Jagurel, Saturnite, Playstone and Threedium. Oxygen is depleted so you can't be too greedy. Green lamps will light the surrounding area but don't get too near as they damage you. Pink flowers are bouncing traps, they will proper you if you get close. Finally, there is no ending yet, either you jump in a box of stars like the first level or you die and the screen turns red. It's a work in progress that he will continue and optimize later after the compo ends.

name: Piczle Lines 2: Flora & Fauna
description:
"Flora & Fauna”adds the following puzzle packs to Puzzle Mode:
- Flora 20 puzzles
- Baby Animals 20 puzzles
- Safari 20 puzzles
- Venemous Critters 20 puzzles

name: Brain Memory: Legendary Edition
description:
Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.
Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

Our brains are the most important tools of the XXI century. Do your child a favor, and give thema gift that will help them reach their full potential.

name: Arcade Archives: Mazinger Z
description:
"Mazinger Z" is a shooter released by Banpresto (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1994.
Take control of Mazinger Z, Great Mazinger, and Grendizer, and use shooting, punches, and super weapons to take on Dr. Hell's Underground Empire! Supports up to two players at once.

name: Disgraced: Western Warfare Pack
description: The Western Warfare Pack DLC for Disgraced brings several new weapons and gear from the West as you fight for justice in Feudal Japan against the evil Shogun!

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Nagomi Shibakko/Mascot Character
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Nagomi Shibakko/Mascot Character (Buster)

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Puimo/Mascot Character
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Puimo/Mascot Character (Buster)

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Jingiskan's Jinkun/Mascot Character
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Jingiskan's Jinkun/Mascot Character (Buster)

name: Meo+
description: A Super Mario Bros. demake for the Playdate.

name: Torchlight: Infinite - Cube of Rapacity
description: Torchlight: Infinite will commence its Global Launch on May 10th, introducing the new season, "Cube of Rapacity."

name: Grand Tanks: WW2 Tank Games
description: Play Grand Tanks for free, unlock new war machines, explore realistic arenas, enjoy the amazing graphics. Constantly updated content that includes techniques, maps, missions, events, and much more. Everything for free and was created to let you enjoy fast and furious blitz battles.

name: Cargo Truck Racer
description: Race through challenging tracks with automatic movement and fragile cargo management. Collect stars, climb the leaderboards, and unlock achievements in this fast-paced, truck racing game with an energetic drum n bass soundtrack and low-poly graphics.

name: Witch's House Beginning
description: Alexei will have to choose several ways to escape from the witch's house. You will have to look for: batteries to keep the flashlight on, keys to open the doors, fuel to fill up the car, etc.

name: Machine Heart
description: Delve into the captivating cross-timeline puzzles of Machine Heart, and unravel the conspiracy behind a mass mind-uploading scheme.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Space Spectacular
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Space themed tables that will take you on a journey through time!

name: Neon Fantasy: Animals
description: Neon Fantasy: Animals is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Eliminator: The Encapsuled Nemesis
description: Eliminator: The Encapsuled Nemesis is an tactical single-player shooter for everyone. Sneak to hostile fortifications, destroy your foes, capture flags, collect new weapons and fight your way through enemy lines to crush their evil plans.

name: Eclectic Expansion Enterprise
description: Expand among the stars! It is 72k years in the future, and a new wave of Human expansion abounds. Join the ranks of the Ecxos, prep star systems for habitation, and develop your tools and ships to enterprise ever faster and further.

name: My Monstrous Roommate. (étude)
description: There is a monster living in your apartment.

name: Inkubus Sukkubus: She of a Thousand Names
description: Play as a medieval witch collecting hidden items (CD albums) in a variety of environments. 16 of the albums to be collected are then added to your jukebox, which can then be played whilst you explore further.

name: Fall Guys: Avian Angler Pack
description: Get ready to reel 'em in with this feathery fishing bundle!

name: Fall Guys: Season 4 - Creative Construction
description:
Creative levels. Custom mayhem.

Fall Guys: Season 4 - Creative Construction adds Fall Guys Creative, an in-game level editor that lets you build custom rounds. Builder Beans can turn our iconic obstacles into chaotic courses and then share them with the community.

name: Fall Guys: Arcade Classics Pack
description: Grab some quarters and hit start on this retro gaming inspired pack!

name: Eden Eternal: Seikyou Densetsu
description: The return of classic MMORPG ! Global Direct Operations!Rich gameplays and multiple updates. Ride adorable alpaca and start your adventure with players worldwide!

name: Project Screwed
description: Work together with your friends in this stressful 4-player couch co-op game as you defend against hordes of enemies trying to destroy your base. Manage both your time and your resources in an effort to balance all the needs of your base. Are you and your friends up for the task?

name: HappyPlayers
description: A casual party game where you can freely match skills to fight.

name: Cabin Escape: Alice's Story
description: An escape game set in the world of Forever Lost.

name: Occupy Mars: The Game
description: Build and upgrade your base, discover new amazing regions, conduct mining operations, retrieve water and generate oxygen, grow crops, fix broken parts, learn how to survive on Mars! Occupy Mars is a highly technical, open world, sandbox, hard SF game about Mars colonisation. Inspired by the most promising technologies and companies who work towards the goal of becoming a multi planet species.

name: Pogger's Legends
description: Pogger's Legends is a turn based 'card' game where you recruit heroes to defeat villains. The battle system is made from the ground up using elements that affect eachother, per-unit stats and unique abilities that can be battle decisive. There are an infinite amount of per-save generated stages and near infinite possible units. Save the day in Pogger's Legends now!

name: Otakus Don't Want to Fall in Love
description: Sin descripción

name: Irwin Ego: Ace Attorney
description: Irwin Ego Ace Attorney is an Ace Attorney fangame, featuring an entirely unqiue cast of characters set far in the future.

name: Furcon Frenzy
description:
The furry convention is almost over and the dealers den is almost out of merchandise!

Catch as many items from the top of the Crowne Plaza without letting any hit the ground.

Watch out though, as the mischievous Pixel-Carni speeds up between rounds!

name: Sweepers Mine
description: Sweepers Mine is a standard minesweeper game, featuring different difficulty modes: Classic, Easy, Medium, Expert, Custom.

name: SuperStar Stayc
description: SuperStar Stayc is a mobile rhythm game, containing the songs from the Girl group Stayc. Developed by Dalcomsoft, the same creators of titles like SuperStar JYPNATION and SuperStar SMTOWN.

name: Let's Sing 2023: Eurovision Hits Song Pack
description:
12 points go to ... Let's Sing! Get into the Eurovision mood with these popular hits from past editions in the Eurovision Hits Song Pack:

- Loreen "Euphoria"
- Eleni Foureira "Fuego"
- Lena "Satellite"
- Conchita Wurst "Rise like a Phoenix"
- Duncan Laurence "Arcade"

name: Overwatch 2: Hero Pack
description: Jumpstart Your Roster of Heroes and Dominate the Battlefield!

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - GOTY Edition
description: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the literal fruits of your labour. With time, you'll discover ways to make your life easier and explore this charming 2D world.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Happy Edition
description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Happy Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.

name: Family Chess: Superb Edition
description: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.

name: Saints Row: The Heist & The Hazardous
description: When an obnoxious movie star double-crosses the Boss, the Saints take revenge with a swaggering, black-tie heist.

name: Water Wheel
description: Water Wheel is a short adventure game where you must escape a strange apartment. The machine that delivers food to the residents has stopped working. Now your only choice is to find a way out.

name: Halfway to Dawn
description: A cinematic short narrative/arcade horror game for the Playdate

name: Zombie Apocalypse: Survival Stories
description: Experience a zombie apocalypse in a visual novel packed with excitement, action, and shocking decisions as you fight to survive in a world infested with the undead.

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Vintage Sunshine Set
description: Walk into the cozy sunshine with these decors!

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Orchid Dreams Set
description: Passionate purple decorations for moms!

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Floral Nostalgia Set
description: Flowers are a timeless Mother's Day classic.

name: Serial Cleaners: Dino Park
description: Clean up the crime scenes on a mysterious island inhabited by dinosaurs, in Serial Cleaners - Dino Park DLC.

name: Risk: Global Domination - Universal Domination Map Pack
description: Taking global domination into a battle for universal conquest in these 4 new space maps.

name: Michi: Expansion Pack
description: Unlock 8 new levels in Michi, the roguelite auto battler. Face tougher Aibos, discover powerful relics, and collect exclusive Aibos to strengthen your team. Dive deeper into the ever-changing forest and enhance your Michi experience.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Sao Paulo
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Venice
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Apex Legends: Arsenal
description:
Before the Apex Games, a more brutal competition held sway: the Thunderdome Games! Here, sibling fighters Sok Leng and Kit Siang Phua reigned supreme. They were joined by August Brinkman, Sok Leng’s eventual husband. But when August’s selfish playstyle led to Kit Siang’s death, August would retreat from the Games, from Sok Leng, and from their young son, Nate.

August spent decades as a recluse. When Nate decides to follow his family’s legacy into the arena, August returns to strike a deal to reenter the Games in his son’s place.

name: UFO: The Ranch
description: Somewhere in South America, aliens have made contact. Visitors have not come in peace to Planet Earth... Open world third person shooter (TPS) game. Single player video game, compatible with Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11 The game locations are inspired by real places in South America.

name: Eddie's Arcade
description: Uniquely satisfying puzzle game spread out over different graphical themes. The puzzles get harder as you advance, giving you the pleasing sense of accomplishment. Collect arcade tokens to unlock new machines. Over 125 levels for hours of play.

name: Meduziak
description: A silly underwater point-and-click adventure puzzle game.

name: Stellaris: Galactic Paragons
description: Add Galactic Paragons to your empires and experience a new level of character and story as great leaders follow your lead to the stars. With exclusive additions to the all-new Council mechanic, leaders who you can shape to amplify the vision for your empire, new civics and more.

name: Ends
description: A highway gothic horror. Your bus was late and now you can't catch your next bus home. You'll need to walk the next couple of miles... alone... at night.

name: Lotte
description: A minimalistic five-minute puzzle platformer, where you become a fly when you die. Immerse yourself in a relaxing forest and use your ability to become a fly to solve puzzles.

name: I Have No Nose and I Must Climb
description: Work with your hands to help Wally reach the top of the world to retrieve something dear to them.

name: Michi
description: Escape a forest filled with unique Aibos in Michi, the thrilling roguelite auto battler. Draft, deploy, and survive against challenging enemies. Unlock new Aibos and items in procedurally generated levels. Can you make it out alive?

name: Pink Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Fishing and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.
